Title: How complete strangers can Bank Heist you and not even on your Facebook friends list

Content: I‚Äôve always loved this board game and having it on my phone now has me hooked. It‚Äôs really addictive honestly, however im on board 135 and my boards have started repeating themselves. I love building the boards and seeing how it changes so i noticed straight away when they started giving me the same boards as is kept progressing. There are some new ones but a lot of them are repeated! Other than that, it‚Äôs a great game honestly.
Title: Fun yet addictive!

Content: Honestly I‚Äôm addicted to the game. But the stickers thing is bulls**t. I joined like 3 weeks before this sticker thing ended. But the fact that we can‚Äôt trade gold cards is absolutely ridiculous and a 3 star was one of the toughest to get.   I had 4 duplicates of 1 gold card last season and I can‚Äôt trade it for a 4 star card? I know the app is there to get money, but make all cards tradeable. There is no reason I had to beg for a 3/4 star card in the group for weeks when I have duplicate gold cards I can‚Äôt trade.   Love the game but fix that nonsense. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Title: Addicting fun but aggravating

Content: I love this game. almost my whole family plays this game.  And if u do not have this game u need to get it right now so if u do not have this game get is right now because it is just sooooooo fun. So this is how the game works so people can rob u and can destroy your land but u can protect it with a orange shield and u only have some dice to play this game and there‚Äôs lots more things u can do in the game so get this game today and show the game to your friends and family
Title: I love it

Content: When I first took in this game I graded it an A+ even said it was better then coinmaster. Well it‚Äôs not for the simple reason coin master allows you to trade your gold cards of stickers there is no reason why a person need 5 gold cards of te same and not be sneezing to share. You most definitely have to spend money to play so now that I know that it will be treated like another game on my phone no excitement at all I will keep playing gave up on closing the sticker album up 7 remaining I am over it Will continue to play at my lesiure
Title: Pay to play

Content: It was fun while it lasted.. unless you have money to blow on this game, I suggest you stay clear. The developers of this game are money hungry and barely give any dice. They want you to BUY BUY BUY. Nope not happening. Not to mention all of the duplicate stickers they give makes it impossible to complete the albums. Also, what‚Äôs the point of receiving so many gold stickers if we can‚Äôt even trade those?? I also don‚Äôt like the fact that a person (who‚Äôs not even your friend) can CONTINUOUSLY knock down your landmarks. They even allowed 3 bank heists on my account in ONE DAY, causing me to go bankrupt 3 times. It‚Äôs ridiculous. I‚Äôm done with this game and I won‚Äôt be recommending it to anyone.
Title: Not Worth It

Content: Love this game, but there def needs to be better rewards for when you get very high in ranking/ going to new boards. I‚Äôm almost level 5000 and still get 50 dice for each board. This 100% should increase each single board you go up. Therefore you can continue playing with more dice. Also another thing is the property set wheel. These rewards are also botched. There‚Äôs an option to get 5 dice / 15 dice / Couple million $ these rewards do absolutely nothing when you‚Äôre at a higher level. Rewards need to be matched with levels.
Title: Rewards

Content: This game is fun and I waste too much time playing, but my adult children play and talked me into and got me building cars and trading stickers. STICKERS, good lord, why do you keep giving the same ones over & OVER? I can‚Äôt complete anything because I have 10 of each sticker I DON‚ÄôT NEED.  And why do I have to hit collect over and over, you know I want it, just give it without having to hit collect three times please. REDUNDANT. Not fun when you can‚Äôt move forward and there is nothing you can do about it.
Title: Fun

Content: This game started out fun not the creators are making it not enjoyable. They constantly give these green packs they have the same cards we already have. None of the color packs are giving new cards. I‚Äôm down to 2 gold cards to close my album and been needing them for a month and a half. The dice amount should go up when completing a certain amount of levels. We should not run out of dice period! If I can‚Äôt get the last two gold cards I need I‚Äôll be deleting this game. I‚Äôve had a few friends who feel the same.
Title: Stressful

Content: monopoly go is a great game! there's lots of opportunities for microtransactions but that makes sense to keep themselves afloat. my only complaint would be that every single time i "run out of rolls" for the multiplier that I'm at, i get 3 pop ups asking me to spend money. regardless, those are quick to get out of and the game is still very easily playable without spending any money at all. i'm in the early 30's levels and i think its super fun
Title: fun game

Content: The game is a very good time skipper if you‚Äôre on car trips or bored at school/work, I just wish the game rewarded you more for playing. For example after you clear the first 20 boards it‚Äôs pretty expensive to move to the next and when you do the game gives a measly 50 rolls and maybe 2 million currency if you‚Äôre lucky. The rewards should scale up for the amount of work you do. Giving me a measly $1.5 million is worthless and a spit in the face when I just spent $100 million getting to the next board. As I‚Äôve said the rewards for this and all activities should scale to your board
Title: Pay to play

Content: Loved this game starting out. They make you feel lucky and you unlocked/earn all these new items and dice, but it ended up taking a dramatic turn. I‚Äôm one of the people who spent money on the game. (You don‚Äôt HAVE to, but they make it real difficult to progress because everything runs out so quickly)   Daily community chest I have friends who constantly say they didn‚Äôt receive dice when I unlocked it with there help. Trading is impossible, it‚Äôs at the point where people ask for real money because the game gives you so little at this point.   The game Crashes a lot, too many bugs when it comes to shutting down landmarks. Tons of people I know stopped playing the game because it‚Äôs so difficult to progress and it ends up getting so boring and dissatisfying.  It‚Äôs impossible to contact them directly about an issue, because it‚Äôs set up with a bot.   Overall the game started off strong and then plummeted. Super disappointed :(
Title: Rigged

Content: i love the game, don‚Äôt get me wrong. it takes up all my free time. the issue i have is with the group and they promote for trading purposes. if they‚Äôre going to promote this group, then they should be able to reimburse you for cards that you were scammed out of or fix the game so scamming doesn‚Äôt happen like on playstation you put up and offer and the other person either accepts or declines. there should also be a gifting button if that we‚Äôre to happen. another critique i would make is not getting multiple gold cards. you either let us trade those or don‚Äôt give us duplicates.
Title: MonopolyGo Trading FB Group

Content: I started playing several months ago, even got MANY family and friends to jump aboard‚Ä¶ was great fun UNTIL RECENTLY‚Ä¶ The higher Levels you reach, the more BOTS and FAKE accounts, which were created BY THE GAMES DEVELOPERS, you have to battle with. I rolled 800 Dice in one sitting and did NOT land on ANY shields.. I either landed on Jail or utility‚Äôs where you have to pay. I haven‚Äôt came across ANY of MY Friends people that I actually KNOW, on my boards in weeks!!! And there is NO WAY to contact support or ANYONE!! I tried and it would not submit, it just kept taking me back to stupid rigged game.  Unless you intend to purchase a TON (like $HUNDREDS+)of in app purchases, I strongly recommend you NOT install this rigged game.
Title: Rigged Game

Content: It‚Äôs a very fun and addictive game I‚Äôve been playing it non stop for a while now. My only pet peeve with this game is the sticker system. Why give us extra gold stickers if you are not able to trade those they need to fix that it‚Äôs frustrating seeing you get 4 or 5 star stickers but they are gold and can‚Äôt be traded. Also when trading stickers there should be a system where big parties are liable for sending the correct sticker or sending a sticker at all. I‚Äôve sent many stickers and just been blocked and not recive the sticker I asked for.
Title: Fun game but

Content: This game was fun I‚Äôm the beginning but the fun started to die out the more the creators of the game pushed the constant Ads at you. The are always trying to get you spend your money on dice. And when there are special games like the baking friends game they make it very unattainable to reach the goal before the game ends. This whole game is rigged for you to get close to winning only for you to run out of rolls and then they push you to buy rolls which you still end up no being able to get far enough. It‚Äôs all about money and me and all of my Facebook friends are deleting this game.
Title: Game was fun in the beginning but

Content: The he game is super fun and gets to hooked right away way soon you realize the game is really about getting stickers. The stickers a frustrating I‚Äôve gotten 500 of the same stickers and still haven‚Äôt gotten any new one. They do have the option to trade them in once you get s certain amount but i have yet to actually receive a sticker that i actually needed. It‚Äôs very frustrating because trading on Facebook has gotten intense and there is s chance you might get scammed.
Title: Stickers

Content: The game is fun, entertaining and a great time passer, but the pop ups you get when you launch the game or run out of rolls is insane! I have to X out of 4 different pop ups trying to get me to buy more rolls!!! It‚Äôs honestly the most annoying thing, I love the no ads thing it‚Äôs amazing but the constant shove in my face to buy more rolls and special packs is absurd. Please get rid of that because trust me, we all see the pile of offers and things to buy on the screen already and in the store we don‚Äôt need them in our face every time we open the app.
Title: Pop Ups!!!!

Content: Your link for filing a refund request sends users in an endless feedback loop. I spent $200 for dice and money, and woke up the next day and $14m of my Monopoly money was gone üí•ü™´if you charge people for money, you should have a disclaimer that says you will not be able to use the resource if someone steals it while you‚Äôre not playing. This is fraud, and I‚Äôll keep sending messages and rating down your game until someone from customer service responds to my requests. If you are reading this review as a user, DON‚ÄôT spend money unless you‚Äôre willing to have the game steal it. ü•∑ if I don‚Äôt get a reply, I will file a claim with the Better Business Bureau.
Title: One star until you respond

Content: The fact that I‚Äôve been playing this game so much and for it to consistently screw me over is ridiculous. I love the game but I just exchanged 600 stars and you guys can‚Äôt even give me a new card!?!?!? Why are y‚Äôall making it so hard. And that‚Äôs the second time. And now there‚Äôs an option to buy gold cards but a minimum of $20‚Ä¶. Like‚Ä¶. I‚Äôve been so down for this game but that‚Äôs the icing on the cake. If you want to keep people playing maybe guarantee that exchanging what we‚Äôve worked towards actually pays out a little. üò§üò§üò§
Title: Stars for cards

Content: I just had to delete this game. Something that I once loved to play. You guys did an update but didn‚Äôt listen to us at all. We asked for gold sticker trading, and you guys made it harder to get gold stickers. I haven‚Äôt gotten a new card in almost two months! I‚Äôm still getting the same duplicates. When I‚Äôm on a winning streak the game glitches! It shuts down and push me back ! I‚Äôve won a 15 minute mega heist numerous times , and did not receive my reward!! Why do I have to collect 1200 of the items in the milestone just to get 600 dice? What sense does that make?? Go back to the drawing board, and actually listen to your customers!!
Title: DO BETTER!! LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE!

Content: Anytime I try to build up an area then go back to rolling the dice i get and error message and the app restarts. I just got the game yesterday and don‚Äôt understand why this is happening. Besides the error message continuously popping up the game itself is really fun.
Title: Error

Content: It‚Äôs fun, but you cannot play against other players, but you get a shut down in bank, rob some other players, but you get the whole board to yourself and you keep collecting money and you can also lose money from some parts on the board but it‚Äôs only -500 but it is a really fun game and it‚Äôs fun to play with your family because sometimes you gotta shut down or bank heist your family
Title: It is fun

Content: Who can resists a good game of monopoly?! I downloaded it last night and I haven‚Äôt put my phone down. If I could compare the feeling of having the want/need to play another game would be it Gives CANDY CRUSH feels and I‚Äôm here for it. I‚Äôve been a solo player so far and waiting for my friends to join to see how the game changes.  But for now I‚Äôm having tons of funs! No glitches that I‚Äôve noticed yet! I definitely recommend.
Title: Addicting!!!

Content: Used to be a fun game but now I‚Äôm getting bored. I‚Äôm not spending hundreds of dollars in your game just to level up or complete challenges. I truly believe this game is rigged in order to get you to try to buy dice. Also when you‚Äôre leveling up, you should be earning more dice the further up you go and not just 50 dice at a time. I‚Äôm passed level 100 and still earn only earn 50 dice each level I complete. That‚Äôs just ridiculous. Don‚Äôt even get me started on the sticker packs as well. Unless you‚Äôre winning challenges there‚Äôs no way to get better stickers. You need to make some changes or people are going to quit playing all together.
Title: Rigged game!

Content: I‚Äôm so tired of not getting a Mega Heist opportunity when it‚Äôs available!! I‚Äôve had it happen multiple times where I land on a railroad, the game signals a bank heist and the game only loads a regular bank heist with the person it was reflecting instead of the mega heist!! Other opportunities like an extra wheel spin or cash grab work fine but there‚Äôs got to be a glitch in the Mega Heist logic!! Please fix!! I love this game but hate to play when it‚Äôs obvious the games opportunities do not work as expected.
Title: Mega Heist does not work!

Content: Our youngest got us completely addicted to this game. I would make a few minor changes but besides that I absolutely enjoy playing this game. However, it‚Äôs having issues today. I have 6 hours left for golden blitz but if I click on either of the 2 ask icons it takes me to the monopoly go trading group (Facebook) if I click on join group it says ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt use this feature right now‚Äù How am I supposed to play properly if it‚Äôs messed up?
Title: Addicted

Content: This game is based on luck with a little bit of strategy. The game is fun, especially with friends but the sticker system is worse than before which is why I‚Äôm giving a 2 star rating. Sticker packs used to give ANY rating from 1-5 star stickers for a certain percentage and now you have to get the specific star sticker packs to get a specific rating (5 star stickers only come from 5 star packs and gold stickers only come from gold packs). The packs are very difficult for players that don‚Äôt spend money to accumulate. On top of that, rewards for the album have been reduced.
Title: Honest Gamer Review

Content: I‚Äôm so over the error messages, I‚Äôm completely over paying for packs of dice and stickers to end up with duplicates I can‚Äôt do anything with because even if I cash them in for a vault I get duplicates and like no dice so it‚Äôs a complete waste. I feel like the money I‚Äôve spent has completely been wasted, this morning I won the top bar of dice an than mins later I got an error message, my game restarted and all my dice was gone. 7 hours later I can‚Äôt get into my game at all.  3 weeks ago I emailed customer support because 1,000+ of my dice went missing and I had screenshots to prove it but no help from them like always.
Title: Screw this game, don‚Äôt download this trash!

Content: The only part of this ‚Äúgame‚Äù that‚Äôs actually a game is the cash grab‚Ä¶ after 60 levels they start to repeat you watch the dice roll they give you fake prizes and money run out of dice in 15 mins and wait hrs for more they‚Äôre hoping you spend $20 for another 15 mins of dice‚Ä¶ do yourself a favor find a real game or download a gambling app.  The 2 stars are because it‚Äôs popular so it‚Äôs kind of fun trading with your friends and family but that‚Äôs all imo.  *Edit* I find it hard to believe anybody that plays this game would give it 5 stars for any reason other than they were being nice
Title: 2 stars for friendship

Content: Completing the album are ridiculous. If I have a 1 star pack why do I receive 2-3 star cards when I need a gold 1 star etc. It doesn‚Äôt make sense how hard it is just to receive a card you need for a particular star set. It‚Äôs cool to receive those 2-3 star cards but I need a one star gold. Why are regular and gold packs separated? Pretty much have to try to win events or hope and pray it lands on a pack you need when you spin the wheel for higher tier star cards.
Title: Why do you receive every other star car other than the ones you need?

Content: The game is was cool but now it‚Äôs starting to be a scam, it‚Äôs been so hard to complete this game because they do not give new stickers. I keep receiving duplicate stickers no matter what I do.. even if purchased they as duplicate. The dice are hard to get as well and super expensive no one in their right mind are going to pay $100 for 3200 dice that goes in secs. The trade sticker thing on Facebook is ridiculous because you help someone and they never help you or lie and say they sent the sticker. This game is not cool. Scopely needs to stop scamming people and lower your prices along with make it a little more easier for customers to play! I do not recommend at all
Title: Such a scam

Content: Somehow I spent $34 in dice and never received anything tried to dispute and kept getting the run around. High multiplyer dice don‚Äôt give much of anything. Monopoly just a wants us to keep spending money. The trade and stickers are trash. Trades should be 10 per day and monopoly gives too many duplicate stickers. Tournaments are hard because who wants to keep spending all that money to get a few dice. And not to mention the albums are a joke. So many people was down to 1 sticker, spent money and still couldn‚Äôt get that sticker nor do they offer the tokens in other ways because that is why people play. So many greedy ways this game makes money.
Title: Disappointed!

Content: This game shouldn‚Äôt allow the mechanism to steal every cent you have. I was at 1.6 billion and in one go someone can easily steal it? Doesn‚Äôt sit right for a game like this. Especially when you spend all your rolls to simply get to that point, just for it to be gone in less than a minute. I deleted it and am just frustrated because I‚Äôve been on this game for a while and truly enjoyed playing but this is annoying.
Title: Robbed fully

Content: Do not put money into this game, very much a scam. I‚Äôve put a decent chunk of money in and this game just endlessly screws you hoping you will put more money in. They change the prices of packs for people who have spent money already. If I wanted to complete my album that has 1 sticker left I would have to spend a 100 dollars for the guaranteed sticker. But my friends only have to spend 20-30. I‚Äôm being punished for spending money on the game??? All in all I‚Äôve spent money on the game and it almost didn‚Äôt even help me, now they wanna squeeze as much money as they can out of me!    Don‚Äôt even bother, it‚Äôs an addiction exploitation machine and nothing else.
Title: DO NOT SPEND ANY REAL MONEY

Content: I love the game it‚Äôs great, but I hate that there are too many gold card duplicates and you can‚Äôt even trade them. It‚Äôs making closing the album harder. Then the cards that are tradable people like to scam others over a card. It‚Äôs just a game people! And then there is the only 50 dice when you complete a board but y‚Äôall keep charging more and more for the upgrading buildings and what not. And why are you charging so much for dice? We all can‚Äôt afford that but other than that I love the game lbvvvs
Title: Great

Content: The game is fun when you actually have enough rolls to play for a while. I managed to go from 5 to over 2300 through stickers, tourneys etc. I maintained it for a bit and am back to 0 now. The game is infinitely less fun now. They don‚Äôt give you near enough rolls to progress at all. They recharge super slow. To win more rolls, you need rolls generally. The pricing to get more rolls is just silly, $10 for 300 rolls that you could go through in about 5 minutes. You‚Äôd likely not land on anything useful and would be back at square one. Please add more rolls. Let me play the actual game.
Title: Fun game, but they limit how much you can play.

Content: -I love this game it‚Äôs a lot of fun! The only thing I do not like is that once you complete a board that cost you over a billion to do, you only receive 50 dice no matter how far in the levels you are. I feel like the higher you get in boards, you should receive more dice than 50. People on level 125 get the same as people on 5 & it cost them less than a million to complete a level. Dice are really hard to come by unless you spend money.
Title: Fun game but needs some changes

Content: I have contacted customer support many times about getting my missing rewards fixed in game. I can‚Äôt even roll half of the time after you finish an album, it gives you rolls. But you guys have failed to fix my in game glitch I have contacted you about many times. It‚Äôs so frustrating you guys don‚Äôt have a live rep to talk to someone about how the game has a glitch that even, after I uninstalled and reinstalled still had in place. It‚Äôs so frustrating because I can‚Äôt move forward with my game. Please fix!
Title: Missing Rewards

Content: 6 rolls every hour is ridiculous. I went to sleep and when I woke up my max rolls still weren‚Äôt full. And 70 rolls go by FAST. It would be cool if we could buy more rolls with the in-game money, since the only thing we can use that on is upgrading the landmarks right now.   Can‚Äôt trade the gold cards at all, even if I have extra of them. And they almost never show up in the bigger card packs. Maybe make it so we can trade for other gold cards at least?   Too many pop ups. Why so many for the same thing: to buy rolls, money, and cards?  I like the art of the maps, and I did have favorite boards! I wish we could go back to the previous maps and just admire the art there!   I‚Äôm still playing and it‚Äôs easy to get far without paying for anything, which I appreciate! But I feel myself getting bored soon. Hope some things change soon!
Title: Fun but could be better.

Content: Personally, I loved this game up until this cake event. I actually play with friends I know and 3 of my friends completed the cake with me. My 4th friend finished our last couple points yesterday afternoon and screenshotted the cake being completed on his end but after logging in the collect our rewards, my cake says it‚Äôs incomplete üòï. I thought maybe it was a glitch so I force closed it twice and it‚Äôs still incomplete! Now I won‚Äôt receive my rewards for completing the event because I had to complete the cake by myself, which I can‚Äôt do without spending money to buy a lot more rolls to even earn points to spin üò§. I feel cheated and now I don‚Äôt trust the legtimacy of the game.

Title: Monopoly GO!

Content: I enjoy playing this game and today when I go to play I get an error message saying the game needs to restart. Ok. I go to roll 200x and land on a space giving me things for an event so I get more dice and cards. Error again. Now I‚Äôve lost that. When I go to roll I don‚Äôt get the same result. I can‚Äôt even roll or upgrade my landmarks without getting an error message immediately after saying I need to restart my game. I have lost progress and rewards over this and I just want to play the game.
Title: Keeps crashing and losing my progress??

It also seems like the higher the multiplier sometimes you get worse rolls. But over all a fun game, you can play and do well without paying, it‚Äôs just easier if you have friends working with you

We‚Äôre getting less dice less new cards less pegs even less spins! It‚Äôs like the creators got money hungry and greedy which there is no need for because we were already spending money before the change‚Ä¶ my whole family used to play now its down to just me‚Ä¶ my group used to have 30 people now we maybe have about 10‚Ä¶ bring the old game back make monopoly fun again!

Title: Great addictive game

Content: I like this game. It's fun and mindless. But oh my god STOP IT with the popups please. Every time you run out of dice they ask you to buy more, not once, but twice. That's bad enough, but let's say I'm rolling with a x20 multiplier. I get down to having 19 dice and they ask me to buy more with two popups. I then roll with a x10 multiplier and they ask me to buy more with the same two popups. Then I roll with a x5 multiplier and they ask again. It's so annoying and I'm begging y'all to change it.

They said they were fixing the problem but it isn‚Äôt fixed and the gift pack sent out didn‚Äôt have any new stickers in it either.
Title: Frustrated

Content: This game is very addictive. Absolutely love the concept and the stickers, especially the trading!! Also the gold stickers are SO hard to come by this time around and it seems harder and harder every day to get enough dice to complete challenges. Title: Love this game

Gold cards were already horrible to get, but now add one to each collection on top of EXTREMELY low gold card rates, you might as well not even try and finish the album. I truly enjoyed this game, and spent money religiously on it. But I cannot back it up anymore as even when you get the simple one gold star card, it‚Äôs dupe after dupe. Highly disappointing, but not shocking that scopely would much rather worry about digging even deeper into our pockets than make their game enjoyable.   RIP: Monopoly go.
Title: Bummer

Which the game will make sure you use them all. Dice is the only way you can do anything. It‚Äôs starting to not be so fun. They cards are harder to come by. Nor is it correct that I landed on the shield 5 different times while using the 20x rolls - I should have 120 shields protecting me. I just signed in to see only three people ‚Äúattacked‚Äù and I only have 2 shields left! HOW??   This will get 5 stars when the math is corrected and honesty ensues.

Content: This game was so fun and addicting! But ever since the new album came out, the updates just keep getting worse and worse. Then the set rewards are significantly lower, even though it‚Äôs harder to complete them now.  The app keeps getting glitchy and kicks you out all the time too. It doesn‚Äôt count the right amount of cookies for the cake event or the tournaments. The bank heist works half the time so you lose out on the timer/money. Now their last update stopped players from getting dice from Facebook friends!!  They just want us to spend ridiculous amounts of money to get dice (because to get only 8 dice you have to wait a whole hour!!!)   So sad because I would play this game non stop, I‚Äôll probably be deleting once I run out of the dice I saved from the last album.
Title: Getting Bad

Content: Can we make this game a little more enjoyable not a hard assignment. I have not gotten a new sticker in literally a week . I love monopoly but I had to take a break because it frustrates me sometime.
Title: Please make this game enjoyable again

Content: If u play it all the time u can tell!! When there‚Äôs a showdown or bank heist for the Dailey challenges U DONT LAND ON IT!! So that screws up your weekly win on the TWO OR THREE stickers U GET FROM PLAYING FOR THE WEEK THAT U ALREADY HAVE !! If there‚Äôs a free parking challenge and u rack up rolls or money for landing in it‚Ä¶ u don‚Äôt ever land on it !! There‚Äôs little things that you can tell with the algorithm that screws you over !! It‚Äôs fun and addicting. But it‚Äôs something that needs to be worked on !!! And the stickers that u need that no one has in the groups that you‚Äôll never get is frustrating too !!!
Title: I love this game but ITS TOTALLY RIGGED..

Content: I enjoy playing this game with my two other friends! It's a great time killer but the only issue I have is that sometimes when doing a 'shut down' on someone, the screen glitches and doesn't allow you to choose a landmark. It also doesn't allow you to switch to another player meaning the game is stuck there until it somehow fixes itself. I would hate to waste a roll like that so please fix! Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Pretty fun but has a few bugs

Content: This game is set up to get u to like playing it for it to then turn into a frustrating money grabbing casino style fight your impulsive thoughts game! They only give u just enough dice, spins, cards, wheels whatever u need to complete the task to get started so u will run out and have to buy more or wait hours b4 u get only a few more to run out again and either buy or wait after waiting the challenge is over and mission is failed. So if u like to spend money or hurry up and waitüò≥ then u might like this game.
Title: This game will turn a smile into a frown and u will more than likely uninstall it ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Content: You can actually play this game without having to put money into the game. It gives you opportunity to get rolls on dice by doing other things besides buying it. The graphics are great and it‚Äôs easy for all ages! I can‚Äôt stop playing! You definitely want to download this game if you want to be able to ply without a ton of adds or having to stop playing bc you don‚Äôt want to put money on a game. I love it!
Title: Free,Fun,Addictive

Content: The algorithms feel rigged. Wheel spins on partner events don‚Äôt give enough points to complete the event. This is compounded by the fact that you don‚Äôt get enough tokens for the wheel spins in the first place and rolls are hard to come by. Also feels like this is pay to win. Stickers repeat too often and the 4 and 5 star stickers are hard to come by. This has spawned a ridiculous market where players are asking for multiple stickers for one sticker. This game should be fun, it shouldn‚Äôt feel like a cash grab
Title: Could be better

Content: I started playing this game this year and I was doing really good and I haven't played for a few months so I decided to get on it and play and I noticed that my whole game reset I was very upset because I had loads of money and good cards and lots of dice I don‚Äôt know if it reset because I got a new phone but I don‚Äôt think that was the problem because I transferred everything from the old one over to the new one if there is anyway I could get my old progress back I would appreciate it thank you.
Title: Progress lost

Content: I love this game but the only thing that really annoys me is that the fact of after you finish the first few sticker albums, it‚Äôs very difficult to get the stickers to finish the other albums. If you get a sticker pack, you will just continuously get cards that you have over and over again and get nothing new. I feel that when you complete albums you should get a extremely lower chance of getting the stickers in that pack.
Title: Fun game

Content: Whenever there are events that require certain tiles to be landed on the game somehow knows and will put you on the tile right before or right after. The game itself will ask what‚Äôs wrong with them as if numerous complaints haven‚Äôt been made. The cap system is ridiculous because outside of buying dice there is no other way to logically obtain them. Tournaments have AI players with randomized scores that are thousands if not tens of thousands points ahead of you. The game does not give stickers until a certain time period in the event. This game is not enjoyable it merely kills time and takes up space it may be addictive but it is not a good game at all
Title: Not A Good Game

Content: The game is not for players long term once you get past board 150 and have a net worth over 7,000 the game is impossible to play unless you are spending real money. The rewards don‚Äôt match the expense if we are tycoons at this level reward us as if. For example 8 free dice an hour, a couple million dollars 100+ duplicate cards 50 dice rewarded if you can complete boards 1 3 star gold card doesn‚Äôt equal the 76 billion dollars it takes me to complete a board. You have spent countless hours trying to prevent ‚Äúcheating‚Äù work on the real problems and people won‚Äôt need to cheat. Do better Jose this would be a great game if you would listen to your users.
Title: Disappointed

Content: This game is fun when you have dice to roll but, if you don‚Äôt have dice getting anything done is impossible. Then if you want dice for free it takes an hour to get 8 dice instead of 80 dice so you have to wait 10 hours to get your full 80 dice. This game will cost you more money then it‚Äôs worth in the end. Do t even get me started on the stickers that are impossible to get. I have gotten 3 packs that were at least 3 starts and got nothing new to add to my sticker collection. This doesn‚Äôt make me want to spend money because your going to waste it.
Title: Fun if you spend hundreds of dollars

Content: The game was great when I first started playing but as you get further into it in level, it becomes very hard to move up. You only get 8 dice an hour and that makes it impossible to even play unless you purchase dice or get lucky and get a sticker you need to complete a set. And the amount of times I had to complain to customer service about the game glitching and missing rewards, or being double charged when you purchase dice happens way too often..
Title: Very disappointed in the game lately

Content: I started playing the game a few months ago because my daughter asked me to join.  At first it was okay but then I kept getting duplicate stickers and never completed the tournament because of it; game keeps freezing on random stuff; large bank heists wiping you completely out from random people that aren‚Äôt even on your friends list without an option to get revenge; and those trash tournaments smh. This cake tournament is ridiculous!  I‚Äôm trying to stay until the sticker tournament ends because I already know they won‚Äôt give me all the gold stickers I need to complete the boards.  Just a money grab and that‚Äôs not cool.
Title: Beginning to not be Fun

Content: Monopoly go is becoming a rip off , these albums are worth less rolls and you need a gold sticker every album, then you barely land on anything to earn what you need to come. The challenges are to far apart and hard to even accomplish from the first time. Just know at first everyone was loving the game but y‚Äôall are making it less and less enjoyable . It‚Äôs becoming a rip off . I have a group chat with my family it‚Äôs about 25 of us now only 6 people responding. Fix it before this game becomes history
Title: Becoming a rip off

Content: It‚Äôs a great game, but it gets very disappointing and boring quickly. The trading system doesn‚Äôt seem fair. Why give repeated gold stars if you can‚Äôt trade them? Why have a limit of 5 trades per day? Why have a limit of how many cards you can receive from trades per day? Also the mega multiplicator thing it‚Äôs just a strategy to make you buy more rolls‚Ä¶ Plus, it has a lot of bugs still to be fixe, but that‚Äôs understandable, because every app has. However, when the app it‚Äôs a game, it gets annoying.
Title: It has potential, but‚Ä¶

Content: So in two days the sticker packs will go away and new sticker packs will take the place. Are y‚Äôall going to give us a wealthy amount of rolls and money if we do not complete the stickers? The algorithm to this game and collecting stickers is absurd. No way to trade gold cards to complete your sets is fine but the chances of receiving those gold cards should be higher. I have 346 picka chew cards and still yet to get 6 gold cards needed. I know this won‚Äôt get fixed cause it‚Äôs a money thing but hopefully people will read this and not invest money and time playing. It‚Äôs a lost cause.
Title: To many extra cards

Content: The new season offers less rewards upon completing albums. Every aspect of the game has turned into making you pay to win. Every board is more expensive to complete while the rewards still are the same as completing board 1. Especially this new season you can see that they are just trying to make players spend money to be able to keep playing and it‚Äôs disgusting. They encourage you to trade with people on Facebook and get scammed out of cards instead of making a trading system within the app to prevent scamming they don‚Äôt care about the player base they only care about making money.
Title: The company is a cash grab.

Content: The crashing and the glitching is OUTRAGEOUS! They make a new update and it is worse than it was before. New album comes out and you have to work harder to finish it and the payout is lowwwww. Like not even helpful in the game at all. I‚Äôve lost stickers, dice, money and other incentives. I‚Äôve been told to wait 24 hours to see if they‚Äôll appear (they won‚Äôt. I‚Äôve been through this before) and then I‚Äôll have to wait 2-4 days to see IF they‚Äôll do anything about it. 2/5 times they have. Horrible odds. I‚Äôm so close to deleting but I‚Äôve spent good money on this game and would hate to see it waste because the developers are horrible at their jobs.
Title: No.

Content: I grew up playing the board game Monopoly and I was excited to play Monopoly Go. I enjoy building landmarks and cash grabs, PEG E the robot ü§ñ. What don‚Äôt like is the limited rolls and the refusal to release stickers to complete the books. Even if you pay for stickers and dice the game doesn‚Äôt release them. I feel that they should label this as a gambling game because ultimately you spend money trying to complete the sticker book. I wrote to customer service and they told me ‚Äúthere is nothing we can do about it‚Äù.   If you are not interested in completing the sticker book then you will enjoy this game.
Title: It Could Be Better!

Content: The game purposely makes you spend all your 2000 dice with high roller by making you land on garbage, then gives you a ‚Äúdeal‚Äù of 25 dice for $9.99. It‚Äôs also way Too hard to get over 100 dice because when you complete most of the sticker sets, your rarely get any new stickers. You should be able to gift dice or have something where you can get dice without dice or irl money. I know people who have spent thousands on this game and have gotten nothing out of it. The game also rips off the people who spend a lot of money by increasing the price by 5x because they bought some things. If the developers of the game see this, please fix this game.
Title: Stupid Game

Content: To whom it may concern, I always get my quick wins challenges done every day, today there was a big fix and my quick wins reset, now there is no way I will be able to collect enough wins to obtain the blue pack for completing all quick wins, I was really looking forward to getting the blue pack to help me collect the more rare stickers‚Ä¶ help if you can  Edit: thank you for the fix! It was a nice surprise and much appreciated!
Title: But fixes

Content: I love this game so much, but one thing everyone I know that plays this game wants is to be able to gift friends dices and money. It‚Äôs such a fun game and I love it so much but that‚Äôs just something I think a lot of people would like and also maybe If you play as a guest that you can use a photo in your photo album as your profile picture but it‚Äôs just idea, thank you for taking your time and reading this üíï
Title: I love the game so much!!! It‚Äôs got me addicted, but I do have a good idea for the game.

Content: I don‚Äôt have many complaints about this game except the fact that there are barely any of certain stickers given out. I have so many duplicates from the game but they are all lower stickers. It‚Äôs extremely hard to complete the album set when the game won‚Äôt give you the stickers that you need. Then they direct you to a Facebook page for ‚Äútrading‚Äù but there are tons of scammers and the admins don‚Äôt remove them. So beware.
Title: Not many stickers are given out

Content: This game is rigged so it can entise you to spend money.  The higher your multiplier, the lower your rolls.  It basically drains your rolls until youre out.  The daily competitions are rigged as well.  How is it possible that someone had 4000 points in less than 5 minutes?  Even with a 100x. Multiplier on, its not possible.  I literally was in second place and the person below me (I'm am sure it‚Äôs not an actual person) was able to push me out the way and pass my by 300 points in one minute.  Im definitely quitting after today.
Title: It was fun at first

Content: The algorithms are obscenely transparent on each new challenges and tournaments. The fact that you cannot trade gold cards ruins the whole point. The purchase packs are way too expensive. The duplicate sticker situation is trash. If I‚Äôm grinding it out I should be guaranteed a reward not constant duplicates. It has become boring and repetitive to the point it‚Äôs not even remotely fun. Fix the game or you will be losing your players and within months this will be a game nobody wants to play anymore.
Title: Blatantly broken

Content: Starts off great with plenty of rolls and forward projection, really hooks you in. Eventually the rolls will dry up and you will will do you daily rolls and get nothing for it. Stickers are hard to come by either in game or trading and gold stickers not being a trade option makes no sense. It is a hot game right now but honestly users are getting exhausted with the grind. The reward on the spin wheel is 15 die that‚Äôs 1 roll for most players. The hype is still here but things need to be fixed before you lose all your users.
Title: Fast start, slow finish

Content: Love this game, but there‚Äôs tons of pop ups when you open the game after having it closed for a while. not ads, it‚Äôs just little extra events and things like that, it just takes forever to click through them all. i think the game would benefit from having small notifications icons over the events at the edge of the screen rather than keeping you from resuming right when opening.
Title: Too many in game pop ups.

Content: I absolutely love this game I cant stop playing it actually just one down side I see on my part is my profile picture I know it‚Äôs just a picture but I don‚Äôt like mine much because it‚Äôs a random picture of a lady and I wish I could change it üò≠ but other than that I see no other reason why someone wouldn‚Äôt like to play this game it can get very addictive! It‚Äôs even more enjoyable when you add your friends to the game as well!!
Title: Change profile picture

Content: Hi, my game was glitching for quite a while had did not been for the glitches and restarting me over even after I had finished multiple task, including building the little towns. It just kept starting me over, even when I completed a task for the dice at the top of the game. I feel like I should have won the game or would have won the game if it wasn‚Äôt for all these glitches. Thank you.
Title: Tournament

Content: The game was fun at first..now it has all kinds of crashes, reloading errors and the list goes on..The amount of money I have spent on the game and keep getting the same stickers..Also when we go higher up we should be able to collect more than 50 dice like come on now..what‚Äôs the point if we are going to keep getting the same 50 dice..overall it‚Äôs a fun game when it‚Äôs not crashing so I can‚Äôt give it 5 stars..also I always update my apps so u don‚Äôt want to hear oh that‚Äôs the problem fix it now!!
Title: Too many glitches

Content: I have had this game for a full day. I do have some suggestions. 1. Adding a chat setting  2. Having an easier way to be able to open the community chest instead of adding friends if your not able to add friends. 3. When you run out of dice rolls should create two options one where you can trade in a certain amount of your money to get more dice rolls and two having friends send you rolls. I do enjoy the game. I hope the suggestions are taking into consideration
Title: Cool

Content: This game is so fun and addictive! I recommend this to all those board game lovers! I downloaded this and thought, ‚Äúthis is probably going to be some knockoff game.‚Äù When I downloaded, I was stunned! There was barley any adds, and I HATE adds! I love this game so much. I‚Äôve only been playing for a day and I‚Äôm already so far in the game. To whoever made this game, I LOVE YOU!!! Omg omg omg omg omg omg omg I can talk about this game all day. You can play with friends, you can play by yourself, just WOW!
Title: Wow!

Content: Great game but ridiculously expensive and very difficult to win prizes that can keep you playing.  I haven‚Äôt received any new stickers in a very long time so it‚Äôs impossible to complete sets. Most of the time you win copies of the same stickers over and over. The special competitions like the car partners is fun because you‚Äôre able to actually win dice which otherwise come in small amounts. I‚Äôm extremely high in levels and you still receive the same small amount of dice to complete every level, no matter how high up you go. Big changes need to be made, no one can afford to play this game.
Title: Way too expensive

Content: I really love this game. But I‚Äôm starting to get really irritated with the fact it‚Äôs constantly telling me to restart the game cuz of an error I can‚Äôt update my board without it saying it. Especially during this ghost car event I‚Äôm so close but everytime I do something. It says restart the game and boom no longer had the stuff I had originally gotten and now ima loose the rolls in this event . I‚Äôm so close into deleting it is there just an update or what ? I‚Äôm so frustrated
Title: 4 stars for right now

Content: I had a lot of fun starting this game today. I got a lot of dice in the beginning and it made it fun to play. However after running out I noticed that you only get 5 dice every hour. I suppose over night that makes sense but to want to just play during the day, it seems like a waste for a refill time of that long. Even 5 every 30 minutes would be better. Then they constantly bring up ads for you to buy for dice. I‚Äôll probably stop playing this game in a day or so, which is a shame because it‚Äôs actually enjoyable
Title: Needs a faster dice refill

Content: I like playing this game - however, there are lots of issues. Like the farther you get in the game the harder to complete a board because it costs more and you don‚Äôt earn any faster or get any more dice. You get the same stickers over and over and very rarely get the ones you need. Plus there are times that you get an error message and the game won‚Äôt open.
Title: Fun game but issues throughout

Content: I‚Äôve been playing the game for a few months. It‚Äôs slowly becoming less fun as the higher levels are harder and they are trying to get you to spend money.  The real frustrating part is they are letting someone consistently attack me who is not on my friends list. I keep having to rebuild my buildings making progress even slower. They also allow them to steal money via bank heists when again they aren‚Äôt on my friends list. Then I can only attack them once and I don‚Äôt have the option to pick them again. I have no way to block this person. It‚Äôs making the game pointless.
Title: Let me block people

Content: The game starts out fun, but after reaching a certain level the total amount of rolls you can regenerate is only 80 , but you have to gain over 25 billion dollars. The other thing is they don‚Äôt resolve issues the right way. I had an issue several times where my partner, or myself leveled up for the partnered events and the other didn‚Äôt get their rewards. Instead of giving the reward they took our progress back a level, and returned a fraction of the pieces used to level up and 25 rolls. Disregarding our time spent and practically robbing us of not only our rolls and event pieces but a fair, unabridged chance to complete the tournament.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Game definitely has a system built in place to make everything aggravating. On the days of the challenges before hand you would of had no problem hitting certain spots on the board; as soon as the challenge shows up, you are going to waste 70% of them hitting back to back Luxury Tax, landing in jail, community chest, free parking. I only hit the railroads by chance cards or I get the rare time where I roll a 3 and land on it. I only use 10 dice a roll and I‚Äôm quick to notice when i have it in auto or I‚Äôm actually pressing spin and my dice go from 1500 to 1100 while on hitting the railroads from a chance card is insane.
Title: Absolute waste of time

Content: I love this game and honestly would give it another star but the more you play gives you no extra advantage. The money goes up that you receive but so does the price of things. I started playing it on another phone to help my sticker game and I get bigger dice and more opportunities just starting out then for a game I sunk money in and have more invested in. Also on the special events that you invite friends to, sell the spins not the dice and people would buy spins to upgrade their cakes or cars or whatever
Title: The more you play

Content: I truly was loving this game. But now there are toooooooo many glitches. I haven‚Äôt received my prizes or dice. I have contacted customer service SEVERAL times and nothing. Tells me to wait 5 days!!! By that time there‚Äôs been other challenges going on and I missed my chance. The newest update SUC*S. I didn‚Äôt have this many problems before. Get it together or a lot of people will be deleting their game.
Title: Not getting my stuff

Content: I have had to do most of the building by myself. I even spend money to try to complete building the cars, while my partner or partners dont help at all or barely help then they stop leaving me to build the entire car while they reap the benefits of me building alone and spending my money. There should be a way to delete them and pick a new partner. They can even take their wheels with them.
Title: Car Tournament

Content: Started out fun but there is no reward for getting to high levels just higher prices w not high rewards.  The new card pack event is a rip off making it even harder to get cards you need especially when you are at a higher level.  The boards recycle they give you the same boards w a different city name.  You only generate 8 dice an hour that you will use in 5 minutes or less.  It‚Äôs just so impossible to get anything worth anything that you loose interest in the entire game all together.  I‚Äôm level 200 and still only get 50 dice for completing a board but my cost to get out of jail went way up!
Title: Not worth it anymore

Content: I recently tried out MonopolyGO, and I have to say, it left me feeling quite frustrated. While the concept is interesting, the execution falls short in several ways. The gameplay mechanics are convoluted and not as intuitive as I had hoped. Additionally, the in-game purchases and microtransactions felt intrusive, constantly pushing for more spending. The overall experience lacked the charm and simplicity of the classic Monopoly game, which was a disappointment. I appreciate the effort to modernize the game, but there's definitely room for improvement in terms of user experience and balance.
Title: Frustrating and disappointing

Content: I love Monopoly Go! However, I noticed that when we play with multiplier you so t always get the rewards due to you. For example, you win something thru the chance card like say 702k with a x10 multiplier the reward should be 7.02 Million. But that is not the case. Similarly, you use the cash to buy property but, you do t see it. The money just disappears. Please fix it! Thanks
Title: Greta game but multipliers do t give the actual amount due!

Content: The mechanics of the game are great, but there are many annoying qualities such as the 5 pop ups you get immediately about spending money to get more things. Another thing is that you run out of dice fast, and when you are low on dice you won‚Äôt land on anything to bring them up again, or you won‚Äôt land on spaces to progress the events to get more dice. When you do run out, you are greeted with 3 more pop ups. The algorithm is quite obvious, and because of this I will never spend money on this app.
Title: Could be better

Content: In my opinion, I love this game. It‚Äôs actually the only game I would put money for just because it is addicting and I love the challenges they have. I‚Äôd recommend playing. But the only thing is, is that they should make a payment option where you don‚Äôt have to keep rebuying dice every time you run out. I give it a 3 rating because it‚Äôs not like the original monopoly that you play with family, it‚Äôs the original board but the way you play I wasn‚Äôt taught to play that way lol so it was kind of challenging to get used too.
Title: Monopoly Go

Content: Fell in love w/ monopoly in 2017 in college when I learned the game. I‚Äôve had an iPhone since iPhones were a thing and this is the FIRST & ONLY game where you can experience it 100% even if you do not purchase in the app. So many ways to WIN & get prizes you don‚Äôt even have to buy anything in app if you don‚Äôt want too! I‚Äôm on day 2 and I‚Äôm about to win my Fourth BOARD!! I LOVEEEE THIS GAME. I usually never write app reviews but I LOVE this app please never change it
Title: AMAZING 10/10!!!

Content: The game is fun but it could be better. First it takes to long and is to hard to get dice. The easiest way to get dice is to pay real world money. Which basically makes the game pay to play. Second the sticker system and trading with the stickers need to change. Not being able to trade gold stickers makes it almost impossible to finish sets. Obtaining sticker packs is even harder then getting dice. You could spend all day winning packs but 99% will be a duplicate and not one you need/ new sticker.
Title: Good but could be better

Content: I was enjoying playing the even though you have to wait an hour for rolls which is the whole point of the game. Like any app they offer in app purchases where you can buy more rolls. On two separate  occasions I brought additional rolls. Each time I was charged more. The first they charged me for the same deal twice. The second time they charged me for a more expensive deal. I only purchased one offer because it came with additional items. After I was denied a refund for a purchase that I did not make I knew it was time to delete the game.
Title: This game steals your money!

Content: I love Monopoly. And this new mobile game is such a wonderful successor to the original board game version. It‚Äôs so much fun, a great distraction and totally satisfying to play. They give you a lot to play with from the very beginning which really is fun and feels realistic. No FB friends who play this like me? The game starts offering in-game friends which allow you to get extra bonuses with community chest and various other bonuses.
Title: Top-notch monopoly fun! My mobile game fav!

Content: Here I am reminiscing my childhood. Maybe this time I can finish an entire game for the first time lol this version is very user-friendly. It‚Äôs exciting in a fun way. It‚Äôs not impossible to win coins or extras, Like in most games now. Pinchme gave me an opportunity to play a game that I love, but have not played in years! I love the fact you can play with friends, you know or make new friends. I would say this is a game for all ages.
Title: Monopoly

Content: The tutorial when you first start playing the game shows how you build your town and once complete, you go to another town to build. The colors are vibrant, the directions are clear and it helps me clear/reset my brain when I need a break from work. There are no ads which makes it even better and has in-purchase capability of you want.
Title: Helps unwind

Content: The game was already hard enough and almost impossible to finish partner events. Now they‚Äôve changed it and made it even more impossible !!!!! it went from 60 K points to finish a partner event up to 80 K points!!!! now why would they do that?? Oh yeah, so people would spend real money buying their little amounts of dice that don‚Äôt go far at all. after this partner event is over, I will be deleting this game. I spent hundreds of dollars on this game and I‚Äôve still not been able to complete one single album. this game is not about having fun. This game was simply made to get money out of people.
Title: they keep changing it to make it even harder

Content: I like this game and the intensity of it trying to challenge your friends. Well at least for me and my bestie. It‚Äôs fun and with a crazy world it actually breaks the monotony of life.   I would like to see better prizes when finishing boards. 50 dice when you finish a board? That‚Äôs all? How about a 100 and for every 10 boards finished 200. Also add in better packs that actually have a new card and a gold card. Or even better let us give the gold cards.
Title: More Dice

Content: I was in the middle of playing then it keep saying sorry game has to start over it kept doing that and is still doing it‚Ä¶. I just won dice n finally a new sticker‚Ä¶ u can buy coins or money they give you the same stickers I been had the same stickers for over 2 weeks I finally got a new sticker‚Ä¶. This technically problems need to be fixed because that‚Äôs not fair to the ones that‚Äôs really using money sometimes‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ 8 dice every hour y‚Äôall just want us not to ever win frfr‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Title: Always something wrong

Content: I love this game and play is every single day. However, there needs to be some serious consideration with making the game more reasonable for the people. Including allowing gold cards to be traded and giving more dice rolls. A certain amount of rolls per hour is not fair at all. And don‚Äôt even get me started on the rarity of the higher starred cards! More people would stay on the game if some things were more attainable. Please make some changes!
Title: Love but needs improvement

Content: This game is funa nd addictive but it is discouraging when the game doesn‚Äôt give you your rewards multiple times.  Multiple times it has shown that I received a prize of dice but the number was not added to my dice. I have also hit the prize point in the contests and it seemed to be ‚Äúhung up‚Äù because it would not give me the prize or move forward on the progress bar even though I landed on spaces that gave me tokens toward the prize.   The game needs to be more reliable in order to be fair to the players.
Title: Fun but not reliable

Content: First off, this is a super fun game and great way to pass some time and relax. The one thing I hate (and curious if others feel the same way) is how someone can just repeatedly attack your buildings since on shutdowns you can choose your opponent. A limit on how many times one person can attack another per day (or per 12 hours) would prevent that. It‚Äôs certainly fun to attack friends but then there is overkill, especially when you‚Äôre such a high level and the cost to repair and complete a board is astronomical.
Title: Shutdowns

Content: Seriously annoying how difficult it is to get stickers and dice rolls on this app. They feed you an addiction and then don‚Äôt let you play when you don‚Äôt have dice. Then they expect you to pay for dice which you WILL DO. ALL good FREE WAYS TO GET DICE ARE SHUT OFF when the company finds out about it. APP IS ONLY AFTER YOUR MONEY!! The aim is to get all sets of stickers, but they only reward you with ones you already have. Somebody I know spent $500 on this game and packs and still wasn‚Äôt able to get all of the stickers needed to complete his set. Ridiculous real life money scam. Kinda fun until you realize it‚Äôs impossible to win.
Title: Stupid waste of time!! Money muncher developers

Content: The game is great but I don‚Äôt like that it takes 8 freaking hours to get an reupholster. I‚Äôve spent money on top of money trying to finish my whole album still no avail my daughter has finished the album twice now on her third go round. I‚Äôm high ranking on the list it‚Äôs not fair I‚Äôve won #1 in the tournaments and still can‚Äôt get one simple gold card. I‚Äôm getting less interested in the game day by day  Thank you
Title: Sabrena Everett

Content: I used to really enjoy this game but now it‚Äôs so many things that irritate me. Starting with some people can always find your board and attack your board but when you go to find them in your friends you can‚Äôt only in revenge but revenge only lets to attack once after they attack you. So I got this kid tearing my board up but I can only attack his board if I catch him in the moment or once. I feel like after the update I don‚Äôt get nearly as much dice, stickers, or shields. Which these 3 things run the game pretty much. The game is overall become unfun
Title: Game has changed for the worst

Content: I absolutely love this game and enjoy the camaraderie with fellow players. I have been a little disappointed with the second season as it has been more difficult to get rolls. I was really looking forward to the baking tournament but found that all of my hard work in acquiring cookies to bake our cakes was in vain. Every spin results in low numbers‚Ä¶Why is this so much harder than last season? I‚Äôm not enjoying it as much. Please change the algorithm for rolls and spins to allow a fair mix of high and low numbers.
Title: Second season sadness

Content: I have been playing this game for months now but I‚Äôm noticing a couple of issues.  1. You don‚Äôt get rewards to balance out the dice you use. It doesn‚Äôt have to be 50/50 but it definitely should be better mid term rewards. You spend 28K dice to win 5K.   2. When doing events like baking events. When you land on the cookies the 3rd-4th time you won‚Äôt receive your cookies. You can use as many as 300 dice to land on cookies 3-4 times. So that‚Äôs not fair.   3. When there are issues you cannot get immediate support. The best you can do is enter a message in Chat Now but there is never a resolution. They say we will send an email in 5 days if we find an issue. Or you get we will look into the issue then a request for a survey of your support. WHICH YOU GET NO SUPPORT!   Besides the issues with receiving your earned rewards and not being able to get immediate support. The game is fun but if I don‚Äôt see the system working properly soon I will have to stop playing.
Title: Fun but Feels like a Rip Off

Content: Been trying to collect and trade with family/friends for the albums. Decided since the albums was about to renew I would trade in 1500 stars for the chance of finishing one out of the 6 decks i‚Äôm waiting for a gold card for. Then I proceeded to get three gold duplicate cards. They should really have a thing where you can trade gold cards for gold cards cause it‚Äôs so stupid other wise. I do enjoy the game but you really have to pay to play to get all the challenges. Annoyed over the lack of chances to finish decks.
Title: Pay to play

Content: I love the app. I don‚Äôt really like to play real monopoly but this extremely fun being able to play with friends. The only critique and negative I have is that I wish there was more ways to get dice. I don‚Äôt have the money to keep purchasing bundles. It would be great to be able to play some puzzles or watch ads to get dice. Besides that I have recommended the game to many of my friends and will continue to play!

Content: I understand the luck aspects with getting stickers and all but if ya have spent a minimum of 200 dollars on this game then you should complete the album, I have sears to do so and I believe it is ridiculous I put time and money into your game and constantly am I getting disappointed, I have not received a new sticker in 20 some days that is ridiculous, I would greatly appreciate if y‚Äôall looked into this because I do enjoy the game it‚Äôs just the fact if I was to want to complete this album I spend 70 dollars for one bundle that only guarantees one new card.. 70‚Ä¢10 is 700 dollars and that‚Äôs even more ridiculous. Please fix your game
Title: Unfair odds of monopoly Go

Content: I have really enjoyed playing this game and have even purchased pack after pack getting nothing new. It‚Äôs very discouraging & it makes me wanna delete the game all together & tell my friends too. Title: Disappointed

Content: I wish you guys implement a proper trade system where we don‚Äôt have to send a very rare sticker to someone first not knowing weather or not that person will send what they promised or just disappear. Maybe something were we both select the sticker we agreed on trading and there are 2 options to confirm trade giving us a fair chance to make a successful trade plus a chance to change our minds if the other person tries scamming us or changing the sticker at the last moment.   Yours respectfully  Monopoly Go player
Title: Trade system

Content: I will start by saying I like the game a lot. But‚Ä¶ There are some issues with it. You don‚Äôt get enough dice, or heists. The mega heists don‚Äôt even work. ( I have screenshots to prove this but there is no way to attach them here )The stickers are always duplicates and when you trade them in, you get a tiny amount of dice ( 10-20 ) and more duplicate stickers making it impossible to complete sets unless you are willing to spend a fortune in real money just to buy your way through the game. As I titled this review, this game needs work.
Title: Needs work

Content: Great game when it actually works.  Tons of glitching and most times you don‚Äôt get the rewards showing in the game.  I currently have 129 of the peg-e tokens I cannot use.  When you tap the icon to use them, the game freezes up and you have to close the app and restart.  I‚Äôve had this issue non-stop since the last update.  Very frustrating to not be able to claim rewards and the game freezes all the time.  I‚Äôd hate to see what happens when you actually pay money for anything on the app.  I haven‚Äôt purchased anything because of it .
Title: Great game when it works

Content: The amount of bugs in this game is ridiculous funny and entertaining by now. At first, i got so frustrated about how often these bugs occur and not completely fixed, to the point I tell myself ‚ÄúOh, it‚Äôs one of those bugs again‚Äù. It‚Äôs like a player becomes alarm-fatigued from the bugs and just accepted it as ‚Äòpart‚Äô of the game moving forward.
Title: Bugs like bed bugs all over

Content: Game is fun, absolutely fun. However, why does it take 1 hour just to get 5 rolls? This is a tactic to make a person spend money to get rolls. I think the time should be lowered, it‚Äôs not like you can get more than 40 rolls if you wait for the time. So, why not have 30 min for 5 rolls instead of 1 hour. Other than this, I think the game is very fun, but the amount of time it takes to gain rolls again, would be the reason I no longer play.
Title: Fun but needs some tweaking

Content: This game used to be fun and fair when I first downloaded it a few months back. The creators have updated the game and rigged it for you to lose and spend money that won‚Äôt yield any big wins.   Also they‚Äôve made it so if you have a high multiplier and leave the game and come back it will reset your multiplier to the lowest setting. New stickers are hard to come by you only receive lower one star stickers and usually multiple dupes of stickers you already have. When you purchase dice you only land on non relevant spaces. And railroad only brings up shutdowns. It‚Äôs time to delete.
Title: Game is rigged

Content: The game is cool and fun, but you can‚Äôt get stickers to complete sets.  The trading page on Facebook everyone wants stickers for a million stars, some are asking for money for them to complete sets, people are scamming people for stickers.  It‚Äôs so annoying and in the meantime the game barely gives out 5 star stickers which everyone needs. Free game, yeah right if you don‚Äôt buy a million packs for extra dice and a shot at a sticker you  need you get targeted and have to rebuild your properties constantly so it takes forever to get to the next level.  They need to fix issues so the game can be enjoyable after you hit a certain point.
Title: Do not download

Content: I play this game everywhere, at my parents house, on the toilet, in my room, ect. The dynamics are fun and it‚Äôs something great for friends and family to stay connected. NOW, that being said it would be nice ,to have the option, if you can use the menu while using the auto roll‚Ä¶only thing that really came to mind :) other wise W game

Title: I actually enjoy this gameüíó

Content: I downloaded this game because it looked fun, and for about a month it was.  Then I got real about how much money this app was asking for EVERY. DAY. Here‚Äôs an example. I am 2 Gold cards away from finishing this month‚Äôs album. They are asking for ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY DOLLARS for 2 digital cards I won‚Äôt even have anymore when the new album starts in Sept.  Absolutely ludicrous and money hungry. I don‚Äôt want to be stuck on a level for days at a time because I‚Äôm waiting an entire 8 hrs for a decent amount of leverage to actually play.
