Title: Not getting a response from customer support for 3 months now üë∂üèª

Content: Hello to the MonopolyGO authors, you did a very well on building a little game where I can play whenever I have Wi-Fi, but the only problem that I experienced is that you cannot send money or dice to my friends or they send me some. I wish you would add this option to build your community and help each other, because in order to build monopoly, you still need friends in orders to build something new. Thank you Nikita (your game fan)
Title: Very well done game

Content: You can‚Äôt win a tournament without spending money because they put you in tournaments against people who spend ridiculous amounts of money. You can‚Äôt get new cards because they make it next to impossible with the gold cards. While trading in the groups you constantly get scammed. The community chest isn‚Äôt random they decide if you win or not. The amount of dice you give you daily are literal crumbs. It‚Äôs fun for a few days when you have dice and are able to complete your boards but the more you play the more unbearable the game becomes to play!
Title: Pay to win

Content: This game was fun at first. I completed a few tournaments and actually completed the last album, but I had to purchase guaranteed sticker packs to do it. Now every set has gold cards, obviously to push the guaranteed sticker packs. Have never been able to complete the peg e challenge. Have never completed a main event. Have only placed top 10 in tournaments a handful of times. There are soooo many pop up ads that I can barely stand it. The wheel spins only ever land on the 2 star orange packs. Ever since the update you can tell the deck has been stacked against us. Not fun anymore
Title: Time waster

Content: Edit: This game cares nothing about its users. I finished my cakes on day 2, ended up with almost 6K extra cookies and how did the game thank me? By converting those cookies into cash. Only $1 billion which is barely enough to finish 1 landmark for me. No dice, no stickers, just cash. I am encouraging everyone to either delete or spend no money on this anti user money hungry game.   It is a great game but it is also rigged. Only Friends are allowed to get Friends in a Bank Heist yet this game will allow millions and sometimes billions to be stolen in a Bank Heist from someone that‚Äôs not on your Friends list. The game takes your money to force you to spend real money for rolls.
Title: Rigged

Content: It‚Äôs a very fun game until you notice they are nurfing it. Some Events are extremely hard to achieve you need too many Rolls to achieve them. Also the game loves landing you on Community chest then jail then free parking consecutively another thing is 7 dice per hour is HORRIBLE fun game until you start spending real money Hasboro should Loosen up a little people will start to delete. And the stickers are hard to achieve there should be missions for stickers not just getting gifts
Title: Fun at first

Content: Let me start by saying I love this game !! I like how there‚Äôs extra rewards and tournaments as well as the card albums , I just hate how we only get 50 dice per board i‚Äôm on board 135 and i‚Äôm only getting 50 dice and we only get 8 rolls per hour !!! It‚Äôs frustrating I want to play this game so bad but i‚Äôm not trying to spend my actually money !! It‚Äôs hard to get dice once you run out and you can‚Äôt complete anything or win anything with no dice . Maybe start doing dice grabs instead of cash grabs and giving more dice rewards !!!
Title: Game Time

Content: I LOVE monopoly GO but I feel totally ripped off. I have been GRINDING like seriously for the last 4 hours of my day to get the last 400 scrolls I needed for the 1.1k dice. I swear on my life I would have got it had the scrolls actually went towards my progress!! The last 2 minutes of the challenge it wasn‚Äôt taking my scrolls into the count. I AM HIGHLY UNHAPPY and disappointed in the game. I will never commit to a mobile game like this again. Please award my account the EARNED 1.1k dice.
Title: No customer support chat?

Content: In the newest update in cocking the updated sticker albums they nerfed the rewards exponentially and make it harder to accuser the stickers. They did make it to where you could get through some of the annoying animations faster but it doesn‚Äôt exucse making the game less rewarding to play. All in all it was definitely a money hungry move by the company and I think for that I‚Äôm going to stop playing it. No sense in putting my time into the game if they are just going to make it pay to play.
Title: Pay to play?

Content: It is like playing board monopoly with tons of people.. the only part is the fact that there is a full blown race for the cards to complete the boards that is sick and not in a good way.. people get mean.. and the trade that is going off line should be ilegal!! This is a family game that is supposed to be enjoyable. It makes me sick to my stomach..it would be nice to have more dice as you upgrade your building! 50 always???
Title: Addictive

Content: It‚Äôs a great game to keep you busy but unless you buy the packages you wont get any gold cards and I notice every time you get close to winning something big you wont land on the things to finish getting it like for example i kept getting chips to play the robot and now that I‚Äôm close to winning the packages I all of a sudden stop getting chips but of course you can keep playing you just have to buy chips smh!!! So yes I will give it 4 stars !!
Title: Only 4 stars

Content: For all these people who say they can‚Äôt advance or that it‚Äôs a pay to win game ü§£ü§£ü§£ it‚Äôs a skill issue but this game doesn‚Äôt even take any skill. It‚Äôs all luck and picking your cards right but there‚Äôs no cards to pick lol  Games fun but when you don‚Äôt have dice it‚Äôs boring especially when your up in higher lvls cause everything is more expensive.  Not bad for a time passing game but you have to wait for time to pass to play lol
Title: Im lvl 1600 and I haven‚Äôt bought anything

Content: This game is really fun and a little addictive, however, it‚Äôs gotten increasingly hard to use the cards to your advantage. I get several card packs but they‚Äôre ALL duplicates. It takes weeks to get a new card. The game encourages trading cards online but that should NOT be the only way to fill out a deck to win prizes. A lot of people on the social media groups don‚Äôt want to trade or will pretend to trade to get your card then leave you before giving you the card you need. It‚Äôs ridiculous. I put this game down a lot because I only seem to do well when I spend money. I‚Äôm kind of sick of games that keep their hands in your pockets.
Title: Super Fun, BUT

Content: Really enjoy this game. However we would like to be able to add as many people as we can to get dice because the higher you get the less dice you receive. At some point people are going to quit. Especially with the multiple duplicate STICKERS we receive. It‚Äôs really challenging and that‚Äôs why we enjoy it but we also would love to reach the milestones at some point. Once again I love the gameüòÄ
Title: Best game EVER

Content: This game is very addicting and it‚Äôs a craze right now. But the way it‚Äôs going people are going to start losing interest real soon. How is it that it take $100M to complete a board, yet you only get $2.2M and 50 DICE once completed. Yet every level the amount it takes to get out of jail goes up, the amount to complete the board goes up, but not the amount of dice you receive. You can‚Äôt play the game without dice and wait an HOUR for 7 dice is insane. Also these stickers!! How is it that we continue to get duplicates and everyone is looking for the same cards, but even if you buy them, you still get duplicates?! Very frustrating
Title: If Only

Content: I‚Äôve submitted manyyyy issues to customer service and have not heard back about a single one. Extra annoying considering I‚Äôve spent money on the game and the supposed response time is ‚Äú2-4 days‚Äù and it‚Äôs been wellllll over that.  Don‚Äôt waste your money. The game will crash and you‚Äôll lose the dice and stickers you paid for. On top of other glitches and bugs. I loved the game until this issue arose. Really disappointed that the customer service isn‚Äôt better considering everyone I know has had or is having issues and are not getting responses either‚Ä¶
Title: Still waiting to hear back from customer service

Content: I love  Monopoly go so much. I never am able to find a  game that I actually enjoy playing. Their is also no ads and your able to add friends and invite people to play with you. Ever since my latest birthday I got the board game monopoly and it was SO FUN then one day I was playing one of my boring games and a add was talking about this monopoly go and it looked fun so I got the app and it was the best day ever I actually found a game that I really liked.
Title: SO FUN

Content: What‚Äôs the purpose of giving duplicate gold cards if they can‚Äôt be traded? I think they we should be able to cash them in for dice or money. And why is is so hard to be obtaining certain cards? Most every pack only containing one new card. Or opening duplicate packages and not getting a single new card! The game is starting to get boring because we need dice to play not every ones want or can buy dice. I just think it should be more ways to obtain dice in reference to the duplicate gold cards and make it a little more easier to obtain certain cards.
Title: Obtaining Cards/ Card Issues

Content: This game I enjoy. It brings back childhood memories with a twist. I love the fact that you can destroy a friends property and gave the chance to rob their bank. One thing I wish we could do is send each other rolls like we can with stickers even tho it‚Äôs plenty of opportunity‚Äôs to get rolls if you run out. All in all a very good addictive game.
Title: Fun game and addictive

Content: Constantly getting prizes where the card says x20 or x10 but then I only receive the exact value listed on the prize. It‚Äôs stupid. If I get a chance card that says win 30 rolls and separately has a space that says x20 I would expect to get 600 rolls. If the price value is already multiplied then the card should state the original value so you aren‚Äôt constantly feeling cheated by the game. I don‚Äôt even know why the original prize would be 1.5 rolls. Something has to be wrong with the app. Or if the prize isn‚Äôt being multiplied by the number of rolls I‚Äôm using then it shouldn‚Äôt show the 20x on the prize card.
Title: It‚Äôs a fun game but don‚Äôt waste your money

Content: This game is good but not what I suspected. I thought I was going to get the original monopoly game and not getting dice every 5 hours or something. There is a lot of game adds* for 2 bucks or something. It is not bad but if you do not like game adds popping up in your face every time you run out it is not really the game for you. I do recommend this game but I wish there will be the monopoly like the bird game not the new one right now.
Title: Good

Title: Best game I‚Äôve played in a long time

Content: How is it possible that someone I‚Äôm not even friends with can attack me over and over and over and over and constantly do bank heists but I can‚Äôt attack them or do bank heists on them that is entirely unfair this means I‚Äôm being taken from more than I can receive because more people are coming for me than I can go for‚Ä¶. Content: The new sticker album has really ruined the game. Everyone needs the exact same stickers. When you complete an album the reward of dice rolls has drastically reduced. When I first started playing me and my teammates were able to complete the event. But since the release of the new sticker album it is very difficult to impossible. Now they allow trading of gold stickers. But you only have so many hours to trade and you can only trade the two stickers. One of the ones we can trade hardly anyone has. Obviously this game is a money grab. I hope people don‚Äôt put cash in this game.
Title: Changes make this more of a joke

Content: I love this game if it was fair it‚Äôs impossible to get new stickers, I‚Äôve opened over 300 plus stickers and have not gotten any new stickers yet, also the board doesn‚Äôt give you the correct dice amount back when you lands on the shield, and I‚Äôve landed on the train so many times and the bar is not moving, this game is becoming a scam to get you to constantly buy more dices, and I brought 3 package that supposedly guarantees a new gold sticker but I didn‚Äôt even get a new sticker, less known a gold sticker I‚Äôm about to delete the app therefore I want think about playing, they‚Äôre barely giving you decent amount of dice anyway
Title: MonopolyGO

Content: If you‚Äôve played or have CoinMaster- MonopolyGO is by the same company and is very similar to, yet completely different than that game. Both are strangely addictive and ultra-fun to play. I can‚Äôt really explain why I love these 2 games other than it‚Äôs fast paced, non-stop action and you get smash peoples perfect little villages and cities and steal all their money. But, they get to do that to you too- so watch out!

Content: I absolutely love this game but monopoly you got to change something. Title: Monopoly Go

Content: I rate this a solid 3 for 1 reason. Unless you plan on spending money for rolls be prepared to wait time to play. Sometimes you roll 2000 rolls and it barely pays out. What I mean about that, is in the events you need a certain amount of space lands in order to get rewards. Sometimes it requires you to roll 1500 dice to get a 180 dice reward. It‚Äôs sort of hard to get stocked up on dice unless you spend money. But it‚Äôs a really fun game just annoying that you can‚Äôt participate in events because you have no rolls left.
Title: Problem

Content: This game is awesome. It would be nice if we could by dice with some of the money we make on the game, and even trade gold stickers at least for 1 special day. But overall it‚Äôs great. I got my whole family playing and and it‚Äôs even become a challenge almost us. Thanks for making it interesting and fun. I really enjoy the little games within Monopoly GO like the cakes and the cars we got to build. A++++
Title: Love it

Content: I shouldn‚Äôt have to spend 8000 dice just to be rewarded with 1200.  Make the prize reflect what the player is doing.  Same as with the cards. So maybe not have to join up with someone to do mini games, and earning points/tokens should be a little bit easier.

So fix the bugs and issues of not being able to search someone who‚Äôs attacked people more than one time not being friends.

Content: The game is literally the same from level 1 to 10,000. Rolling dice gets boring, they should make it more interesting, trading gold cards, sending dice to players, Buying cards with monopoly money. There should be an advantage when you're a higher level. The game should have more things to do. A lot of people quit after a while, its literally the same routine in the game, there is no advantage when you go higher in level besides seeing a higher level number and a different city to build but the same concept for every single level.

Title: Not fun anymore! It‚Äôs actually sad!

Content: The last sticker event before this one I was 8 cards away from completing the album , all were gold stickers. Just little things that‚Äôs irritating but overall 9/10üëèüèø
Title: Overall, I Love it!

Content: I love this game. All my friends have it. The only complaint I have is the cost of the rolls. $100 for 3500 rolls? You have to have a multiplier on at least x20 to get any rewards from the game so that number runs out in less than an hour. Just wish the rolls were easier to come by especially when you reach around level 45. The landmarks get so expensive so without a high multiplier, you get hardly anywhere.
Title: Game is amazing. Rolls are too expensive!!

Content: I don‚Äôt like the stickers. They‚Äôre as useful as the Columbia House stamps would be now. It takes too long to collect them and you can only exchange them for a few dice, or even more stickers.   Worse, by the time you wait for the whole prize box or sticker pack to open and unload, you‚Äôre susceptible to someone breaking into your bank and stealing all or most of your cash. Why not have a quick prize collection alert‚Äîinstead of a pop up‚Äîand we can open the prizes later?
Title: Could Be Better

Content: I loved playing this game in my spare time. Collecting cards, participating in the little challenges, everything. I had made a few purchases on my original account to get where I was at. I have contacted support on three different occasions and I keep getting the same message ‚Äúsomeone will contact you in 24 hours‚Äù. I‚Äôm so mad and highly disappointed in customer service.
Title: Liked then lost progress

Content: Shortening the amount of time it takes to get more rolls this will increase the amount of people who want to play the game more because waiting and hour for 5 rolls where as I have similar games that have less than a 30 minute wait time is ridiculous is there anyway we can shorten the wait time to 5 rolls every 20 minutes please and stop with all the pop ups one is enough

Content: I love this game because it is better than playing it a home and if you don‚Äôt know how to play it is a great way of learning how to play monopoly and my little brother don‚Äôt know how to read  and he try‚Äôs his best to use the sentence that they say to you and he read the longest sentence on there and we all was so proudüòä. Title: I love this game very much

Title: Same cards every time

Title: Love this game

Content: The High Roller Bonus where it amps up your multiplier for a time period is stupid. It doesn‚Äôt give you the option to deny the bonus. Title: Fun, BUT‚Ä¶

Content: This game is lots of fun and very addicting quick. However, I gave it a one star because of the sketchy behaviors of the game. To begin with, as soon as you log in you are hit with 3 back to back sales ads of dice that you have to clear out. Then the game is filled with fake users created by the game itself that robs you to force you to feel pressured to actually pay for things out of desperation to advance. Finally, I‚Äôve seen bot accounts made using the profile pictures of people I personally know and confirmed it was not them who actually made the accounts.
Title: Addicting and Fun but developers are scammers

PATHETIC you all should be ashamed I won‚Äôt be playing any longer it‚Äôs never going to improve since they‚Äôre gaining or should I say stealing so much money from people!
Title: Such a money grab it‚Äôs pathetic

Content: I downloaded this app a little while ago and have recently deleted it. It‚Äôs not necessarily a bad app, it‚Äôs just SO REPETITIVE and quite honestly boring. Title: App Glitches

Title: I love it but....

Content: i don't think it's fair that after i wasted over 500 dice, all i get is 300 event tokens. a lot of other people got 1000 dice. i spent all morning winning tokens, upgrading landmarks, and everything else, it's just not fair. i feel like this is a thing that happens every week, i've spent $50 on this game and it's just not fair that whenever the game messes up and i waste all my time working on the game, all i get is 300 event tokens and other people got that AND 1000 dice. if the game messes up, and y'all decide to send out gifts, everyone should get the same thing.

Content: The game can definitely be fun at times BUT you never land on anything to advance you to the next level without having to buy extra dice. It will just roll you around the board until you use all of your dice, then you get to the last few and it wants to finally land you on a railroad or something for the tournament. Especially if you‚Äôre using the multiplier.   The dice being refreshed every hour is also terrible. How are we supposed to compete in these tournaments if we have to wait alllllll day for 60,70,80 dice ?   As for the properties, they all look the same as the first 25 we go through when starting the game. Why is costing me almost $2 billion to upgrade map 112 when it looks like map 13. üòí   Then when you upgrade the world, we only get $32 million after spending billions to upgrade. Along with 50 dice. It‚Äôs unacceptable.   The whole game needs to be updated.

Content: First season was a blast, full of challenge was -almost- achievable made me want to continue playing nonstop.   This season? Now? Useless, i have seen slews of posts showing no new cards and only landing on the lowest payouts, makes me not want to level up because I have nothing to look forward to.  - Community chest is completely unable to be fully opened or get a decent payout.  -tournaments are covered in bots? This has been proven by many.  You guys had a good thing going here, It was fun. Why did you ruin it?

Title: Stickers

Content: I love the game, but for the past week, I have had so many technical difficulties playing the game. When it works, it is great. When it doesn‚Äôt work, it tends to freeze, it won‚Äôt allow me to roll the dice, I can‚Äôt upgrade landmarks, or see my sticker album. Even two levels had completely black screens (except for the board) and so couldn‚Äôt see any landmark I was upgrading. The prize bar at the top gets stuck. Is there anyone else experiencing this?
Title: Is anyone else having technical issues?

Content: You can see the manipulations the game does to prevent you from moving forward as quickly as you would if the game was really up to chance. You will land on different spaces at different frequencies based on what you need or don‚Äôt need depending on what challenges or events they have. The more shields you can hold seems to have a direct relation with how often you land on shields. It is amazing how many of the chips land in the leftmost slot on the plinko style game; at least 25-30%.   The game is very rewarding when you are starting out, and when you spend money, but other than that it is very clearly against you.
Title: Terrible game

Content: The fact that there‚Äôs an endless barrage of pop ups right when you start the game is an immediate turn off. I want to play the game when I open it, not have to hit x (or worse, wait for a bunch of animations before it even gives me an x to click!) why is it that Scopely can‚Äôt make a game without adding 55 pop ups to the beginning of each game? If I wanted to spend money, I would. But I don‚Äôt. And the constant pop up begging makes me not want to play the game at all.  Stay away from this one. There‚Äôs better ‚Äúfreemium‚Äù games out there. Better monopoly themed ones especially.
Title: I would give no stars if I could

Content: This game is awesome only started playing for about 2-3  weeks ago, I absolutely love it but you need to give people the cards they are needing , it‚Äôs no reason that everyone needs the same card. Your trading group is getting worse, they are actually charging people money for the cards they need. You should really fix that like ASAP, it‚Äôs no reason half the world needs the Right At Home card  and that‚Äôs why I gave you 3 stars . Also you need to give more dice .
Title: You need to give us the cards we need

Content: Y‚Äôall should make it so that u can trade gold cards also, cause what‚Äôs the point of duplicate gold cards and u can‚Äôt trade them??  Also when u hit a different board not just the money should go up the dice should as well cause u run outta dice to fast an the sticker packs don‚Äôt come fast enough to get new stickers to close albums to get dice I understand the 8 every hour but that‚Äôs not enough dice
Title: Gold Cards an dice

Content: Love the game but they def need to do some upgrades!  Why when completing a board do you only get 50 dice no matter what Level you are on?  Dice reward should get higher as you level up.  Wheel boost?  What the heck is the point‚Ä¶ 15 or 5 dice?  What does that honestly do?  The stickers ‚Äî also a waste.  I have not received a new sticker in over a week but I have so many Multiples of gold level stickers that can‚Äôt be traded.  And wait an hour for 7 dice?  At this point thinking of bagging it unless there is some changes.
Title: Monopoly

Content: For anyone who likes to play Monopoly, this is for you. Once you get those dice rollin‚Äô, it‚Äôs hard to put down. Then when the rolls are out, you‚Äôre just waiting for new rolls to come in to play some more. Watching the money build and leveling up makes you want to play more.  Thank you for including San Antonio as a level. Gummy Drop didn‚Äôt do it for my town, but these folks did.
Title: Warning: This Game Is Addictive.

Content: I‚Äôm doing the baking partners and I‚Äôm in the last one with my mother and it‚Äôs not showing her half of the baking on my app but on hers it is. I thought she wasn‚Äôt helping out until I went to her house to she she was almost done with the last part of the cake (TOP Prize) but on mines it‚Äôs showing like I‚Äôm the only one baking. I‚Äôve tried updating, restarting everything and it‚Äôs still saying the same thing. Can y‚Äôall fix this I wanna delete and restart but I don‚Äôt want to lose my whole process.
Title: It deserves 5 BUT!

Content: I fell this rendition of Monopoly is one of the best ones online and in the Apple App Store. The game is fun, keeps you entertained, and provides enough free content to maintain the user interested and wanting to level up.   I wouldn‚Äôt mind drop money on this game for extra spins. Seems like the developers keep it competitive and the graphics are exceptional.  Keeps me coming back for more spins and content.
Title: None pushy play time to buy game.

Content: I was disappointed. It's nothing like the board game. It's fun but just like not. It's like piggy go which is an amazing game. I recommend piggy go not monopoly go because I feel like piggy go is so much better and fun. These are my opinions so yours might be different. I love piggy go. I've played it since little so now I'm one of the richest players. This game is a total rip off of Piggy go. It‚Äôs also NOTHING like the actual board game. It would be more fun if we were was actually playing the game against people in line. That would make it a lot better and not such a rip off. Thx for reading. ü§©
Title: Fun but disappointing

Content: If only the game was less dependent on relying on others to complete task to gain prizes. Lastly, and most importantly, the fact the we cannot trade golden pictures in albums and having to rely on social media to complete albums. I personally don‚Äôt have social media and it limits me to completing albums, which is a huge bummer. Make alternative ways to be able to complete albums for those who don‚Äôt have social media.
Title: Would be 5 stars if‚Ä¶.

Content: This game is great for testing self-control on impulse spending. It‚Äôs fun to try and see how far I can get w/o spending any money.   Stickers are a total sham/scam - I‚Äôve got the same stickers for over a month now. It‚Äôs clear that in order to get the rest and complete the album, I‚Äôd have to buy a pack that guarantees 1 new sticker. That‚Äôs annoying and disingenuous on the devs part, but ultimately it‚Äôs just a game and doesn‚Äôt matter.   Pro-tips:  -Always spend all your money, try to leave as little in the bank as possible before closing the app. -It‚Äôs ok, even beneficial, to leave your shields empty. It‚Äôs an easy and cheap way to get blue tokens for upgrades. -You don‚Äôt have to use all your dice at once -  they can‚Äôt be stolen. Sometimes I log in just to complete the daily challenges and it‚Äôs nice to have extra dice on hand.
Title: Ultimate pay to win

Content: I like the game but there are things that can be better such as the pop ups there‚Äôs TOO MANY also a pop up every time I run out of rolls it‚Äôs annoying. Also the amount of rolls you get every time you go up a level should go up at least 10 rolls each time because I‚Äôm on level 150 & still get 50 rolls even though everything else goes up it shouldn‚Äôt be as hard as it is to get all the cards you need I‚Äôm not gonna spend money just to get the ones I need.
Title: Ehh.

Content: This game was once really a lot of fun to play, spinning dice upgrading boards doing partner events it was awesome.  Then we saw the true greedy money hungry scopely come out and they made it harder for you to play the game by increasing the overall cost of everything in game and I‚Äôm not sure what‚Äôs worse, the fact that they charge you 100 dollars for not even 5 thousand dice, maybe 2 5 star cards and a couple of in game dollars which is never even enough to upgrade a board.  It‚Äôs truly sad that filling their wallets became more important than creating a quality game
Title: Used to be great

Content: It‚Äôs really sad how much you guys charge and to top it off why we cannot use the money we win to buy dice. I‚Äôm quitting this game. You already have to wait an hr for 8 dice. That‚Äôs not right. Full of scams. If you want to win you have to spend almost $100 a day. No way and then you cannot even get the cards you need after two weeks of playing. I‚Äôm done!!!! Back to solitary
Title: Cost

Content: I love the game. It‚Äôs really a fun time.. .my kids have it and we enjoy playing and trading stickers. Evry day or 2 there is an event where you can win prizes based on your rank I won the first 2 I participated in. After that, it‚Äôs impossible. Almost immediately after the clock starts, the first 1-8 players have 80,000 or more pieces towards ranking. Even when I‚Äôve spent $200 daily on rolls, Ive never been above 2000.  Monopoly Go needs to find a way to stop the bots that are cheating the game‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a well known issue.  I still play but I think I‚Äôve been robbed for my hard earned money.
Title: Too many bots that keep you from playing fairly

Content: Monopoly is my favorite board game, so was thrilled to discover this app! The only thing I would like to see change, is the partner competition games. There should be a way to remove the partner that does not contribute anything or contributed very little. It‚Äôs discouraging to contribute 20K pieces and your partner contributes nothing & there‚Äôs nothing to do about it.
Title: I love this game but there‚Äôs one thing I wish would change

Content: I love the game helps me pass time during the day and gives my brain a break but I wished we could 1. Donate dice or the cookies that we aren‚Äôt using when we finish these cakes to help someone else. 2. There def should be more than a 5 card trade limit  .  Also you should be able to fire partners who aren't helping lol. But idk just my opinion.
Title: Love the game but could do with some changes.

Content: First you all were taking money doubled out of my account. Second, you guys started glitching after I paid for a package and I lost dice, puzzle pieces and my place on the challenges just to be ‚Äúrest assured‚Äù for 300 puzzle pieces. Now, I pay for a bundle and finish a tournament ‚Äúranked up‚Äù on all gifts, to finish 2nd place but not get my dice for rank up just for second place. This is getting out of hand and don‚Äôt comment under here as if I did receive anything cause I did not. This is frustrating cause you all don‚Äôt respond and when you do it takes forever. I shouldn‚Äôt be spending money on this anyways.
Title: Aggravated!.

Content: I was super excited to play this game with my friends. I love the concept. However, there are a lot of issues.  No new stickers. I‚Äôve been playing the game for a few weeks, I‚Äôve spent money on dice to open additional sticker packs and not one new card. This is extremely annoying.  All of the bugs and lags have caused me to lose dice and rewards. To be honest, Im already getting bored of the game and close to deleting. I‚Äôve just been hesitant because I keep hoping Scopely will do some updates and things will get better.
Title: Fun game, too many issues

Content: This game is overall fun but very buggy at times it‚Äôs will crash after doing a shutdown or heist sometimes. The plus I still get the money or prizes but to have to wait to get back in is a bit annoying. Opening the game takes a while to load even when connected to Wi-Fi. I used to play this game daily just to pass some time but with all this going on it‚Äôs taken the fun out of wanting to play everyday. Hopefully things get fixed soon.
Title: Been very buggy lately

Content: I‚Äôve dealt with the repeated cards in every pack with few (very very few) new cards popping up and the random freezes and glitches without complaint but after this last freeze took the 500 dice I won and customer service decided that a few million in fake money and 70 dice was an acceptable substitute (it was not acceptable) I‚Äôve lost interest in this game and am telling everyone about my experience. I have games on my phone I‚Äôve played for years and spent money on but this game will not be one of them. Player beware.
Title: Not as much of a fan

Content: Someone who doesn‚Äôt spend money doesn‚Äôt have much of a chance to complete their albums. You are required gold cards, unable to trade or gift gold cards yet you‚Äôre able to win the same gold card repeatedly. It makes them useless and pointless.  Rewards are often useless and aimed at getting you to use up your dice quickly. Even when you reach level 250+ you still only receive a small amount of dice per hour.  The game glitches often and you are not compensated. If you write into them regarding the issue‚Ä¶ it takes multiple days to hear back and it is a robot generated response that doesn‚Äôt even address your issues.   The game can be fun but it borders on a scam. So I do not suggest spending money.  They have several issues they need to address and correct.  I understand it‚Äôs a business for them but it is borderline scamming people.
Title: Very imbalanced game

Content: This game is rigged. It started out fun and I have slowly stopped playing as much as I used to when I first downloaded. The creators keep messing with the algorithm and it‚Äôs NOTICEABLE. They want you to spend money on this game which is why they‚Äôre doing what they do. I spent no more than $10 on this game and once I figured out that they‚Äôre messing with the algorithm to purposely make you spend money on it I stopped. They make it impossible to get new cards, impossible to have a ton of dice unless you win an event but you can‚Äôt do that if you have no dice. It‚Äôs not fun anymore.
Title: It‚Äôs Rigged!

Content: Hello,    It‚Äôs a pretty addictive game and I‚Äôve enjoyed myself so far. However I think that adding a bit of intelligent choice would go a long way in making this more interesting. I feel like my brain's just mushing into pudding while watching all this chance. In the original board game there was strategy and choices had to be made. Everything is just a random chance in this game making it pretty one dimensional. Everything that is of course for the decision to spend real money on it lol. To be fair you can choose your multiplier but that‚Äôs not much.   Think about building some choices into the game.   Thanks to the devs for no advertisements and all the work you‚Äôve done! You really can, with patience, play a lot for free and that‚Äôs pretty cool.
Title: Good concept but needs more

Content: With the recent update and the change in the sticker sets this game has become a pay to play type of game. It lost its touch. 10 hours for 70 rolls that lead nowhere. Every sticker set has a gold card and as soon as I unlock one gold card, all I unlock is duplicates maybe 6 times in a row. Then when I unlocked a new gold card, the same thing. It seems like its rigged so that I buy dice with real money. The rewards for completing sticker sets are also lower. Maybe it always was, but it was a lot more fun to play before this new sticker set.

Title: Good game very fun but a fee minor annoyances

The new album you get half the dice and at this point why even bother? It‚Äôs not enough to finish levels or win tournaments. I don‚Äôt fancy spending my hard earned money for a game. Ridiculous.   Looks like they are doing their own ‚Äúcash grab‚Äù
Title: Awful

Content: The whole game is pressing a ‚ÄúGo‚Äù button like a slot machine. There‚Äôs no skill, there‚Äôs no ‚Äúgame‚Äù. It‚Äôs just designed to collect as much money as possible from you by getting you close to your goals without getting you to it. Need 3,000 rings but your free rolls only got you to 2990 and there‚Äôs 3 minutes left? No problem, just buy a pack for 9.99. That‚Äôs the entire game, a cruddy slot machine. At least a real slot machine gives you actual money in the end. This just leaves you a poor sticker and feeling like a sucker. I wouldn‚Äôt waste your time on the game, and definitely don‚Äôt let kids play. Learning how to gamble early on.
Title: Gambling 101

Content: Listen, you make the ability to trade cards but you have SO many people out here making this a cash transaction to trade. These people should be banned but there‚Äôs no way to report them to you and you just don‚Äôt care. The fact that people are really charging $7-$10 PER CARD, is ridiculous. You need to make it easier to help each other because of these scammers and money hungry people.

Title: Monopoly go

Content: I actually love this game however it is completely rigged. I roll the dice and if I get 10 the piece will only move either 9 places sometimes it will go one more to avoid landing on the spot that I actually need. I‚Äôve been so close to getting the rewards but continually miss out because it isn‚Äôt actually moving me the correct amount of spaces. Title: Game

Content: The game sets one up to fail. The sticker packs consistently give duplicates rather than the stickers one is missing to complete sets. The partner competition requires too many points without enough opportunity to get wheels. When using the wheels, the likelihood of getting a high roll on the spinning wheel is low making it nearly impossible to complete a car. I could go on and on. The game is becoming more and more disappointing the longer I play. Rather than be a source of fun and relaxation it has become a source of frustration and disappointment.
Title: Set up to fail, the fun has been taken out of the game

Content: Packs are all overpriced, game doesn‚Äôt feel ‚Äúrandom‚Äù. I understand the pay to play but it‚Äôs just not worth it and honestly just not fun anymore. Save yourself some time and delete the game once you get to the higher levels. No feeling of accomplishment knowing you will never be able to get any of the good prizes unless you spend $50 to $100. Deleting
Title: Not worth it

Content: This is ok at first. A little fun, however once you advance in boards it‚Äôs very expensive to build and you always run out of dice and you need to advance. I‚Äôm looking for a different game now I‚Äôm kinda over Monopoly Go!
Title: Ok at first

Title: Fun game but..

Content: I was optimistic about this game, but we encountered a specific recurring issue. After my son made an in-app purchase and received a new sticker, the app would crash. Upon restarting, the bought packs would reset and instead of the new sticker, we'd receive a duplicate. I've attempted to reach out to the developer team multiple times regarding this, but to no avail. Recently, the game has been inaccessible due to loading issues. I hope the developers can address these challenges for the benefit of future users. Until then, I've chosen to uninstall and pursue a refund.

Only people on your friends list can bank heist and vice versa, plus I‚Äôve never been able to steal 175M from someone ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è It take a while and a lot of rolls to save up what I do so that makes it very annoying and I‚Äôll now be one of those people that‚Äôs deleting the app. I agree with all the other complaints on here too, the game is dead after a certain point.
Title: Cheating

Content: I have never seen a piece of media so blatantly try and trick it‚Äôs users into micro transactions. Every time you run out of dice, enter the game, or really just use the app, you are bombarded with a seemingly endless supply of pop ups trying to sell grossly overpriced products. The color-fullness and design of these pop ups almost seem to try and trick the user into a purchase. With this game being marketed to children I have no doubt that hundreds or thousands of people have fell victim to these predatory business practices. This app is emblematic of the greater issues behind the moderation of digital products.
Title: State of In-game Purchases

Title: Cards

Content: This game should just be a button that you click over and over again, oh wait it is.  No strategy whatsoever.  The few decisions you do make have no consequence in the outcome of the game. If you are looking for mindless button clicking to kill time this is you.  I feel bad for anyone spending money on this.

Content: The only way to get ahead in this game is if you pay out of pocket. That can get very expensive. Stickers are another issue. Way to many duplicates. Yes, you can join Monopoly GO on Facebook and trade, but most people will take from you and never give back. The trade limit is five trades a day per person. Not near enough. This is my last day on this game. I will be deleting it off my iPhone today.

They should be paused during shutdowns, bank heists, quick wins, landmark buildings and other collections. I‚Äôve also noticed how there‚Äôs never a landmark attack or bank heist against me, while I‚Äôm actively playing. Only when I close the app. Looks like I‚Äôll be deleting this app really soon. They spoon feed you a VERY small amount of dice and thrown ads at you consistently to entice you to spend money that will not yield the stickers necessary to complete your albums. Content: Okay i‚Äôm not trying to rant but this is a failed game because 1. it‚Äôs not fair how you can gather a hole bunch friends and team up to take down one person.2. it‚Äôs not fair that the player has no landmarks and they are able to shutdown your landmarks.3. Content: The game is really fun but the dice distribution every hour of 8 dice is ridiculous it should be higher or we should be able to purchase dice with our cash and collecting the five Star stamps is time consuming you have everything on your board  but that gold 5 star and you should be able to trade them why give us xtra of it if we can‚Äôt trade them.
Title: Dice distribution

Content: Imagine spending money for rolls and raising your multiplier and the game choosing where they want you to land and placing you on tiles that get you nothing over and over and over until your whole $100 purchase was wasted. $100 for some dice to be able to play a game is absolutely absurd. You can buy a video game for any console cheaper and play as much as you want.  Just landed on the same useless spots over and over at least 10x around the board until I was out of rolls. Never in my lifetime of monopoly does that happen rolling dice.
Title: Fun game but rigged

Content: This game use to be fun, the creators of Monopoly Go are greedy, they make it impossible to win , they cheat you out of your money and when you go to them with a glitch in the game they say they‚Äôll get back to you in 5 days BUT NEVER DO!!! I‚Äôve been cheated out of dice, stickers and rewards won in tournaments and mini games! They don‚Äôt care about the people playing their game that makes them millions!! They‚Äôve made it so addictive and then once they‚Äôve got you hooked they rip the rug right out from under you!! If you‚Äôre smart don‚Äôt download this game and if you have delete it FAST!!!!
Title: This game is greedy & rigged

Content: My one complaint would be (b/c I‚Äôm obsessed and don‚Äôt have many) is the fact the algorithm is clearly setup to hit you on the second utility after you hit the first.  I mean every time!  I can see it happening every so often, but every time I hit the first one‚Ä¶I hit the second.  We love playing this game in our family and with our friends!  Great app !!
Title: Utilities

I‚Äôve been contacted them for a week and a half, I‚Äôve been completely ignored!!! App glitched, I lost all of my progress, they will not respond and have not fixed the glitch!!  Word to the wise, don‚Äôt put money into something that you don‚Äôt have customer support or a phone number to fix when it‚Äôs broken!

Content: This last tournament proved with all of the missing cookies, tons of customer complaints, and so many negative reviews that Scopely isn‚Äôt listening and isn‚Äôt interested in retaining its customers. It‚Äôs disappointing because the game was fun, the challenges were exciting to compete in, and I honestly did like it before. Now they just want you to dump more money trying to get more dice for a chance to earn the cookies they already didn‚Äôt give you the first time you earned them.
Title: Buying Back Stolen Items

Title: Needs bugs fixed

Content: Don‚Äôt be fooled by the ads. You really don‚Äôt do anything on this game that‚Äôs fun. You don‚Äôt see yourself visit other peoples boards. They just appear on your board and you collect money from them. You don‚Äôt even really know when you‚Äôre there.  You ‚Äústeal money and destroy their property.‚Äù It‚Äôs not fun.  I TRIED to delete my account. They have you verify who you are to do it. I even gave them a screenshot of my account and they say they can‚Äôt verify me. They‚Äôd aid I have to start process over to delete. I‚Äôve already done that.  I DON‚ÄôT WANT this DUMB game or an account by them.  Delete my account
Title: Very disappointing

Content: It‚Äôs fun at first, but completing any of the events is impossible seems like the game know what you need and avoids giving it to you, unless you want to pay to win. Trading cards are a mess, you‚Äôll end up with 100 you don‚Äôt need and 50 you can‚Äôt even trade. A TRADING CARD that you can‚Äôt TRADE! And every time you open the app you be bombarded with at least 5 different optional purchase pop ups same when you run out of rolls, even if you have some but you have your multiplier set higher pop ups immediately. Overall if you‚Äôre not going to play everyday it might not be worth it.
Title: Fun but‚Ä¶.

If you don‚Äôt have any games, download this game.   Credit to the creators!   Send me some dice

Content: If you h e job where you‚Äôre allowed to be on your phones, this game helps the time pass and keeps you entertained. It‚Äôs really fun and I‚Äôm glad I discovered it.
Title: It‚Äôs Great For Work!

Title: Review

Title: Fun game but‚Ä¶.

Title: Do something about the trading scams

Content: I had this downloaded then deleted it. Classic Monopoly... DO NOT pay the $4.99 for that they are charging! When I downloaded it, it was free. NOW, they've added some features, one being winning jewels by winning games, or by watching videos, which you can use to buy additional game pieces. I had 4000 jewels acquired by winning games & watching their freaking annoying videos! Then... POOF... disappeared! ALL are gone!!! I've gone to "SUPPORT" several times asking where are my jewels. Guess what.... NO RESPONSE!!! AND they're wanting $4.99 to download. üò° Guess they're considering my 4K jewels as their payment for the free download. Fkers!!!
Title: Rip off

Content: Games amazing. ONLY THINGS NEEDS TO BE FIXED!!! LOWER THE $$ on ROLLS. 50$ for 1800 rolls. that‚Äôs ridiculous. fr. if only u guys knew how fast u got thru 1800 rolls even on times 3 or times 5. and stop giving out the same gold cards! how are we supposed to advance and move up? if we‚Äôre waiting an hour for 6-8 rolls? we spend over 100 million to upgrade to get 50 rolls? like come on we gotta do better then that!
Title: PLZ READ!

Content: I‚Äôm new to this game and a lot of my friends is on the game today has been experiencing glitches since last night and we‚Äôre trying to see if something is being worked on to fix the problem because the game will download and then it will create an error message and rely on load the game

I‚Äôve spent plenty of money on the game to get more dice to win more prizes and none of them benefit you after a certain point. I just wish it was more giving.
Title: Stickers

Content: A majority of people playing this game last week lost their progress, myself included. 1000 points away from the main prize & my whole progress bar reset. I should have received 6k dice. No fix ever rolled out, never compensated for what I should have gotten.   They‚Äôre only after your money. Its sad because it could have been a fun time.  I recommend playing any other game. Truly. I‚Äôve never experienced a game with so many bugs and so few rewards for having to deal with them. 25 dice for an almost ALL day outage üòÇ I‚Äôve received more in cookie run for far more minuscule issues ‚ô•Ô∏è
Title: Progress loss

Content: I‚Äôm tired of waiting an hour just for five rolls. Once you ran out of rolls they ask for money. I know it‚Äôs not much money but it‚Äôs ridiculous four dollars for a pack I want the editors to make this game better every other game for a pack is like $1 and for the savage deals have to buy one for $3 who would do that and than you have two free ones I am not spending money for a stupid game like this I wish it was less money a whole real monopoly board is less than all the prices on the game. Title: I hate that we constantly get the same cards.

Content: This game has plenty of twists and turns and mini games that keep you entertained throughout each level. While the dice and rolling odds are suspect, the bank heist and shut down mini games are a lot of fun as well as the computerized robot who plays plinko as well as the chance to compete with and connect with other Monopoly Go enthusiasts.
Title: Not your traditional monopoly but still fun!

Content: This game started off nice for me but then I suddenly found myself doing the same thing over and over , same thing nonstop over and over there‚Äôs no point in playing this game if there‚Äôs no progress , dice go so fast and have to wait until it refills only way is to buy dice which leads this game to pay to win game just like the rest of them , then I find myself bored to death doing the same thing over and over with no point because all boards are completely the same , this game is a junk deleting now

Title: Scam

Content: Game is fun to play when it works. Certain things you do will sometimes crash the game. Case in point attempting to upgrade board houses and the game crashed on me about 20 times. An Error box would pop up and the game would restart. Also, the developers have made some of the events with other players almost impossible to complete. If you want to complete these challenges be ready to pay real money for it.

Content: Obvious money siphon. They studied the algorithms and have executed a very addictive game suited to micro transactions. Beware if you have gambling addiction or really if you have an addictive personality at all. The game also lies. People have told me they knocked down my buildings but I had full shields. Game will say you bankrupt someone but you really didn‚Äôt. Now it keeps crushing over and over. The peg game defies the laws of gravity to consistently give you the worst rewards. The partner up games that build cars and similar things consistently big bucks women make you roll low on the wheel to make you want to spend money

(It sent me back to ‚ÄúLas  Vegas‚Äù, when I was on ‚ÄúAlchemy Academy ‚Äú. 2- The was a technical issue a little while back which caused me to lose a LOT of money.  3- you can‚Äôt talk to your ‚Äòfriend‚Äô unless you have their phone number and can text each other.

And a 1 star gold is nearly impossible as that is only on the wheel spin, but you‚Äôll never land on it. Bring back the old sticker packs, or let us trade golds!

Content: When our Net Worth increases or when we level up to new board, the reward stays the same. Title: Fun‚Ä¶.at first!!

Title: Always turns to pay to play

Title: Why monopoly go is fun to play

Content: It‚Äôs so much fun to play I really love this playing with my friends and family it is a game that I play so much and I just love it and it is so realistic to the real game everything is in the same spot and it‚Äôs just a little different but I prefer monopoly go than monopoly In real life it is just my opinion not everyone has the same opinion as me but it‚Äôs ok I love this game so much
Title: Download monopoly go!

Content: You‚Äôre best bet is to not remove anyone from your friends list because they still have you listed as a friend and they can hit you as many times as they want and you cannot get them back as many times as they got you. ONLY 1 time. The past week I removed everyone from my friends list because I don‚Äôt want any I just wanted to see what was in the community box and now I have been hit over 100 times by the same person in Bank heist, Shutdowns, and Rent. Don‚Äôt bother contacting support they are useless. Update: They told me to contact them, I did twice no response
Title: Friends

Content: Be careful as I noticed back when I started the game and made a purchase, I noticed on my card I had far more charges than what I actually remembered validating. This time I took a screenshot and have the receipt of each purchase I made and I still had 3x additional charges I know for a fact I didn‚Äôt make. Now they won‚Äôt give me a refund even though I‚Äôve stated that I have proof of what I actually purchased and the emailed receipts. I won‚Äôt be making a purchase again and will likely be uninstalling this app because of the dishonesty in purchases.
Title: Overcharging When Making Purchases

Content: I love this game but you guys need to fix this mess. Numerous times while upgrading my house go from whatever I upgraded to 0 houses!!! Most recently, I just upgraded 3 landmarks and my houses went from 3 to 0. Noticed it happened several times yesterday too. I‚Äôm missing so many houses at this point it‚Äôs ridiculous! First, rolls not matching spaces moved, now this. And everyone missing the same stickers‚Ä¶. This game would be 5 stars if you guys could get all these bugs fixed.
Title: Houses Missing

Content: I have played this game very consistently for the week and a half or so that I have had it, and I like it. I want to love it, but there is way too much ‚Äúpay to win‚Äú energy. I think the game would be better if they were easier ways to access the dice for rolling, I also think it would be a more fun game if you could exchange money for dice or other items to be able to roll and gain headway in the game. I will keep playing it, but I can‚Äôt give it a four.
Title: Good, but not great

Content: This is highly addictive although it has its downsides to it. I recommend it but be prepared to experience glitches and abundance of duplicate cards. In app purchases are very affordable to enhance prize chances. Overall still beats a lot of the other games out right now. Will be better as they improve the minor flaws and allow more than 5 trades a day!!!
Title: Addictive

Content: I enjoy the game, I play it daily. I‚Äôd like to see an update where you can make trades within the game instead of talking to people in the online group. Proposing a trade and having the option to accept or deny would eliminate the scamming problem. I‚Äôd also like to see bigger prizes on the wheel. I‚Äôm spending $1 billion to upgrade, getting 15 rolls or green cards is a bit of an insult. Other than that it‚Äôs great.
Title: Make trading available in the game

Content: The current standing of the game is really fun and highly addicting. I always log in to play the events that occur often. My only issue revolves around getting the stickers. The developers nudge players to go on Facebook groups to ask players to trade or gift stickers but this should really be a built in function within the game itself. Prevents scammers and an unnecessary step to progress
Title: Fun and addicting but needs built in trade system

Content: I have put money into this game. It has completely stopped working I was on board 78. Don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs happing. The game won‚Äôt let me load past 30 and I was in process of completing my baking part of it. I had 300 hundred macarons and I want let me log back in. Very upset with this hope they get this bug fixed. I have not had any problems except this one.
Title: Not happy.

Content: I am connected to this app via Facebook. However when the glitch happened it logged me out and when I try to login it tries to force me to login to accounts that are not mine. It will not let me sign into my Facebook account it just says an account is linked. I have tried to find help but there is no way to get ahold of anyone it simply brings me to a faq page. None of those questions have helped me to resolve my issue I‚Äôm on level 83 I believe with about 2,000 points. I have spent a bit of money and do not want to restart on someone else‚Äôs random account.
Title: Logged out of app

Content: Simple fun addicting everything you need in a game & there‚Äôs a lot of in app purchases but don‚Äôt get me wrong they don‚Äôt really get in the way & there‚Äôs a lot of other things you can do to avoid them unless you really wanna support the developers & maybe buy one thing but idk as far as the game goes i gave it 5 stars cause it‚Äôs keeping me pretty entertained!!üî•
Title: Really Addicting!!

Content: Just getting into it, enjoying it tho it doesn‚Äôt feel a whole lot like monopoly. Be cool if you have to do a lap of your enemies board when you visit them. And have to pay for every property you land on. Also the several pop ups is my biggest problem. Don‚Äôt see why they need to keep popping every time you use a single dice roll, gets aggrvo, I‚Äôm sure y‚Äôall are making money off this so it‚Äôs just excessive and will drive away players
Title: Funish game, annoying pop ups

Content: Really excited to play but after a few days it was impossible to play and make progress without buying things which I will not do for any game ever. There‚Äôs no way to friend others in the game so there is no community, you have to wait so long to get more rolls and then only get 5 after an hour. Wish it was more like the real monopoly game. There is so much they could do to improve like creating community and friending as well as ways to get lives faster as that is what the game depends upon.
Title: Was excited then disappointed

Content: This is solid game play. I can play for a long time and don‚Äôt really need to buy anything which is lovely. I will say it‚Äôs rather addictive. I also feel like seeing all the money and prizes every two seconds helps me feel abundant and that is important for the law of attraction. When you feel good you attract more of that. So yeah, it‚Äôs fun for sure.
Title: Well made

Content: The game is awesome. Not perfect, but fun. There are way to many pop ups asking you to buy packages or rolls. I don‚Äôt need reminded where to buy rolls when I run out. It almost ruins the game.   Also, devs might consider adding a timer that prevents being attacked back to back to back.   Other than that, it‚Äôs fun. It would be even better if I could see my friends stickers and request directly from them.
Title: Too many pop ups!

Content: When we level up you should give us more dice. Everything thing goes up trying to buy land! So why not give out more dice to roll to get the money! Whatever level we‚Äôre on should be how many dice we receive that‚Äôs only fair. And stop repeating the same cards all the time! We already can‚Äôt trade the gold ones stop making hard to finish sets! We pay for extra dice and we should get our money worth! 5 bucks for 100 dice isn‚Äôt enuff you‚Äôre robbing us
Title: Advancing to the next level

Content: I love Monopoly, it‚Äôs my favorite board game, and this app is super cool when I‚Äôm bored or waiting in line or need something fun to do. I love the graphics in this game, and the animation is really smooth (and sort of satisfying to watch). This game is really fun, and I like how there‚Äôs always chances to earn rolls when you run out, so you usually can keep playing. Overall, this game is super cool!
Title: Really fun!

Content: They are constantly increasing the prices to complete events, such as this last Halloween event that required 80k to finish instead of 60k like it was before. However, the rewards were the same as always. Sticker albums provide less rewards now but cost even more to complete. Wheel spins don‚Äôt provide any sort of accomplishment as you‚Äôll just get duplicate cards. They increased the duplicate sticker vault from 1500 to 2500. All they want is people to spend money. The game is addicting, especially in the beginning, but I would stay away from it.
Title: All they want is micro transactions

Content: App won‚Äôt stop crashing Nov 1 Hard to complete challenge when app has crashed 20 times in a row Deleting game. That was not cool. You didn‚Äôt give everyone wheels for the glitch and didn‚Äôt extend game time so we could finish the cars. Such a mess.  Game was fun but if you can‚Äôt own up to your mistakes and have an even playing field then what is the point.  While the glitch was going on and the game was crashing I lost all the money and dice I had got for one of my cars finishing right before it started.  Lost interest when you decided not to make it right.
Title: App crashing today

Content: I have been playing this game for months and to start it was so fun! They‚Äôve since changed the game and it is no longer fun to the point I‚Äôll be quitting after this car partners event. I‚Äôve never landed on the tax tiles or community chest tiles as often as I have the past 2 days. When spinning on the cars partner challenge I can only get 60 or 80 points and it now takes 80,000 pts to complete each car vs 60,000 to complete each toy during the last partner challenge. It‚Äôll be near impossible to complete this partner challenge without spending real $$$ and I‚Äôm not gonna do that.
Title: Game is Rigged

Content: Not a bad game, but certainly lacking. Frequently receive more duplicate stickers, making it difficult to complete sticker album. A possible bug in the app is hindering the current major event, the spooky car show partner event, limiting the amount of steer wheel on the play board to collect from down to four from at least eight. When issues are reported customer service seems to be slow to respond or ensure the issue is resolved
Title: Not bad but‚Ä¶

Content: The game is fun when you start, you get dice,new cards and sometimes have a shot at winning tournaments. It quickly hits a point where you can‚Äôt get any new cards the boards are impossible to level up because the dice you can earn for free caps out at a meak number and the dice reward for beating a board stays the same. Mogo also needs to add an ingame trade feature like PoGo since they can‚Äôt fix the delay on receiving cards-people myself included get scammed by the groups they promote while also not trying to keep us safe after spending money to get those nice cards.
Title: Money hungry

Content: The online Monopoly game brings the beloved classic to life on your screen. With a user-friendly interface, vibrant graphics, and the ability to play with friends worldwide, it's a great way to enjoy the game. Keep an eye on its monetization strategy for the best experience. Whether you're a Monopoly enthusiast or new to the game, this online version is worth a try!!
Title: Classic Monopoly Goes Digital

Content: It is really good overall but I only have 2 complaints one is that gives you free prizes and it says that it going to give you 3 but when you click on one the it turns into you have to buys it. My second is that you have to click X so many times because there are so many ads like when you first get on the game  but I love having the game and it is really fun

Content: When I first played this game I wasn‚Äôt too sure I liked it. But later I unlocked all my things in then New York city map and was HOOKED. I played for days and night non stop. Thank you MonopolyGO and I get sad when my dice run out but other then that it‚Äôs a great game
Title: I love this game!

Content: I played this game last night with no problems, today, however, it won‚Äôt start up without an error message making it restart. It goes into a loop trying to startup, then error, restart the error over and over. They say it is a known issue for some users that they are investigating.
Title: Unable to start the game

Content: After being gone on a business trip I arrived home and downloaded monopoly go with my wife and figured we would give it a try. Once the kids went to bed she gave me that good sweet lovin from being gone, but once I fell asleep she took all my Monopoly money and spent it. If I knew she was going to rob me I would have spent all my Monopoly money on landmarks before going to sleep.

As well as we shouldnt have to wait an hour for 7 dice, it should fill the dice bar if you want people to continue to play it. We should be able to trade gold cards as well.

Content: The amount of dice we get now is ridiculous. You need a lot of dice to get more dice. You‚Äôre maxed at 80 dice a day and then with free gifts and quick wins you‚Äôre lucky to get 150. The tournaments go way too quick for you to complete anything to get more dice. 50 dice to complete a board is ridiculous once you get higher up. The stickers this time around are so hard to get. I haven‚Äôt had a new sticker in 2 weeks. Makes it very difficult to play a once enjoyable game.
Title: No dice

Content: This game became popular and Greedy. It‚Äôs impossible to finish tasks because it‚Äôs hard to land on the dice to finish a task, you send cards and it take a day or two to receive it. Customer service is the worst. A lot of people is going to stamp playing. The gold cards is impossible to get. They want us to spend money on this game. I‚Äôm not doing it. The bots always steal billions of my money. How can I upgrade a landmark with no money? 8 dice a hour is insane. There‚Äôs a lot of bad reviews and the creator need to read these reviews and make it better for the players. Stop being money hungry and give people more dice
Title: Rigged

Content: So idk if this has happened to anyone else but the game wouldn‚Äôt let me play until I got an update. No biggie that‚Äôs normal. But now my game freezes, glitches, and just flat out doesn‚Äôt work! I even logged out and uninstalled the game just for it to act out still! I wish I didn‚Äôt need the update bc I was having so much fun with it!! Before the update I would‚Äôve given it a 5 but now it‚Äôs definitely a 1! Still gonna give a 3 incase it starts working again!
Title: Update

Content: This game reminds me of like clash of clans to where you get to curtain point and then it‚Äôs pay to play your way to complete sets and get money once you surpass level 5,000. Then Facebook group is just a bunch of scammers that the admins dgaf about because the company is just money hungry. Poor game and poor improvements. The amount of dice is a total wack job especially when you‚Äôre sitting in the billions to upgrade 1 landmark. Dice are rigged when the events come down of either landing on tax tiles or railroads and corners. Use to enjoy it but now I‚Äôm on the verge of uninstalling it.
Title: Pay to play and complete sets

Content: I finally had to delete this game.  You wait an hour for 8 dice that get you nowhere.  No matter how high a board level you achieve you never get more winnings.  And they make it impossible to get stickers you need.  Trade all you want‚Ä¶ the gold stickers are impossible and even when you find one they are usually a duplicate.  I spent a lot of time and money (more than I care to admit) and never really got anywhere.  I have to be done and deleted the app.  I wish you better luck.
Title: Addictive but plan to pay to play

Content: Check Reddit, Discord, etc. Tons of evidence that this game is highly rigged to force you to spend money. With the recent changes it almost got worse. If there is ever a review that needs to be read it is this one. It will start you with tons of success and it will slowly filter you down to either force you to purchase packs not worth the price or you cannot play for hours until your ‚Äúenergy‚Äù is refilled. With the addition of the ‚Äúgold cards‚Äù to finish objectives you cannot get those cards unless you pay for them making this a PURE money grab scheme. DO NOT PLAY.
Title: Most rigged game.

Content: I have a group of friends that play with me. We all noticed our roll onto a cookie was not adding any numbers up. Several time through our play! Monopoly wants a screen shot to prove this. Yes, I paid mint for the games. No, I do not have buyers remorse. I would pay again but the game is not trustworthy. Sadly all 26 of us may quit. Also, I reported the bug to Scopely‚Ä¶ they kept ending my chat session and demanded I prove it. If I was beat fair out of my money I would not be reviewing and warning others. Do NOT pay to play. Not until the glitches are fixed!!!
Title: Was great until the mini game glitches

Content: This game is fun and entertaining just wish they gave you more time to bake the cakes and other partner events also I wish they would give you more time to get your cards together and be able to trade gold cards as well also getting 8 dice every hour isn‚Äôt cutting it. They need to give you way more for having to wait a hour.  And also when your partner isn‚Äôt doing there job in partner events you should able to swap out partners.
Title: Time to bake cakes

Content: So sad the way this game went downhill. Just a money grab at this point. Saddest part is, developers don‚Äôt realize that when you reward players for FREE (Like not cutting rewards in half for stickers) people will pay to have FUN! Nothing is fun about waiting an hour for 7 freaking rolls that don‚Äôt even buy you a building at higher levels. Same rewards for higher levels and lower levels‚Ä¶what? No thanks. Waste of my time. Games are meant to be fun. Good while it lasted I guess. Good luck everyone. Have fun in tournaments against bots. Pay attention to placements in the tournaments AND your bank statements.
Title: Uninstalling

Content: These pop ups every time I enter the app or have no more rolls are so annoying and is not going to make me buy anything but instead delete the gameüôÑ. Also the card system is so dumb I don‚Äôt have facebook so I don't get the opportunity to tade cards which puts me at a disadvantage, I missed out on the rewards for the last card collection and I was so close to finishing it but kept getting repeat cards after opening over 100 packs. Card trading should be in game with friends to be fair to everyone. Im really about to delete this game more frustrating than fun.ü´§
Title: Pop up galore

Content: The gameplay and everything is fine, gets super boring after about the 30th board. It‚Äôs fine.   Biggest issue is the absurd about of pop up‚Äôs and in-game ads for IAPs that you‚Äôre constantly bombarded with. Open the app? 5 pop up offers $5-$20 each. Out of rolls? 3 more pop up‚Äôs. Can‚Äôt afford anything? How about another 6 pop up‚Äôs with our ‚Äúbest offers‚Äù. It‚Äôs ridiculous and ruins the fun charming experience.   Also, a little thing, music and sound options are toggles and not sliders. It‚Äôs a bit of a first world problem, but it‚Äôs also a bad design choice.
Title: Insane Monetization

Content: I suppose if you want to teach your kids that they have to rob, cheat, steal and destroy in order to get rich then this is the game for you. When I was growing up I played Monopoly and it actually taught how to manage our resources. How to balance your resources holding just enough in reserve to cover adversity while still investing in order to get ahead. The only thing this game teaches is you have to be a backstabbing thief who destroys the accomplishments of others. This is definitely not the Monopoly I remember from days gone by. I don't mind a cut throat game but don't advertise it as family game for 9 year olds.
Title: Family Game?

Content: Very common issue that‚Äôs been happening is people losing their account even though it‚Äôs linked to Facebook, phone, and google. When you put in a help ticket and provide all the information they ask for they just say ‚Äúsorry we can‚Äôt find the account‚Äù. This isn‚Äôt just a couple people.  Don‚Äôt spend money cus they will not compensate you for the lost time and money spent on the account in ANY WAY!  Worst customer service I have ever seen. Either they are incompetent or just like to cheat the people that play the game.
Title: Don‚Äôt spend money! They won‚Äôt help you get lost account back!!!

Title: Fun

Content: I‚Äôve been on Facebook and sent an email, so this is my last hope before I just delete it.   DICE WAIT TIME üëé  1 hr for 7 dice is ridiculous. STICKERS üëé  Why even have different color packs if I‚Äôm only going to get mostly 1-3 stars in all packs? Even the blue and purple packs have low star cards in them. That‚Äôs such a waste of time. Title: Deleting

Content: You know that video of those old people in the casino where they‚Äôre just button smashing the slot machines at a casino? Content: Even though you can just play the board game the mobile game is not fun ü§© now I own New York and London in the game but if you play as a guest be aware that you might have to wait if you use all of your dice üé≤ or you can pay to get dice but this game is very fun and also if you‚Äôre playing you can‚Äôt change your character so you might wanna have facebook

Content: The game is actually fun but after you‚Äôve experienced 10 interruptions in one day of The game just shutting down randomly with an error message of how it can‚Äôt load its makes it feel not worth keeping the app. Its weird because some ppl still have access and you come back to nearly all of your progress being gone from other players but you can‚Äôt get in for hours rather you delete the app and redownload it. Title: Addictive

Title: Sticker Issue

I needed 8 and my friends had 3 of those I needed but couldn‚Äôt trade because they were ‚ÄúGOLD‚Äù.  Such a rip off.  Each of the two contest I‚Äôve participated in have caused me to believe ‚Äúthis game has a very self serving profit margin‚Äù. Not worth the expense.
Title: Money making app

Content: This game is very mindless, easy to play, and overall entertaining. I have been playing every day for a few months now and still enjoy it.  Some recs I have to make it better: - Allow for simpler trading between friends (show us what cards our friends have and allow us to propose/accept trades) - Longer duration on challenges
Title: Love this game

Content: The game it‚Äôs self is fun, but the amount of time it take to accumulate dice is a bit much.  I‚Äôm up to 8 dice per hour and it cost over 2B to upgrade towns.   And with each town costing more to upgrade, there should be a better dice upgrade feature beside 8 per hour.  I get that they want you to buy dice but it‚Äôs really not as much fun when you get past board 100. It take too long to save up dice/money.
Title: Slow but fun

Content: The game is very fun to play but lost interest in the length of time you have to wait for 6 or 7 dices. I have received over 600 duplicate cards so it is impossible to finish all cards to obtain dice. It appears it is a money grabbing game. Spend money to get dice or more money. As you increase your standing on the map, the dice remain at 50. Could at least increase the higher you go. All around great game but hard to enjoy unless you spend lots of money.

Title: Best pay to play game for those who can‚Äôt spend money

Content: I love this game, but a few changes could be made:  ‚Ä¢ More rolls per hour (at least in the 2 figure range, 50-70, even for new players, as with multipliers, rolls get used quickly) ‚Ä¢ Players should be rewarded for completing sets more than once (basically having +1 of every card in a set should allow for a another reward period, and this should happen every time whole sets are duplicated) ‚Ä¢ There shouldn‚Äôt be a cap on dice you can  receive from adding new players from Facebook or other methods of invitations. ‚Ä¢ Players should be able to have more than 5 sends a day, as a lot of us love to donate and share stickers with others. A good limit would be 15-25 stickers per day for every user.  Thank you, Sage

Title: App keeps crashing

Content: At first when I played the game i thought it was going to be one of those games where I had to spend money but if you play smart you can get a lot of rolls for no money at all, I‚Äôm also happy that their isn‚Äôt any stupid ads preventing me from playing the game every day their is an event going on and challenges that get you great prizes.
Title: Addictive

This was supposed to be an easy game, trading was meant to be fun. People were supposed to help other people out. Now all I see is people hoarding cards and making unreasonable trades. Content: I‚Äôm going to be honest when I first started the game I was indulged in it but over time I notice that the game has been set to bring you down when you are too far up I don‚Äôt like how the dice comes back the over three times in a row or how the spin does the same thing now I believe my odds can turn bad but over thirty times in one day. I had 800 rolls and I just had to put 50 golf gloves up but instead the game had me roll till I made it to 30 dice and then start letting me hit I was very furious with that I would like the chance and odds of the dice be more random like real dice

Other people can also hit landmarks then, but for some it still shows there are shields up and they can‚Äôt partake in the takedown. This makes absolutely no sense. Please explain how this is possible.

Content: So it‚Äôs a very good game. I mean like if you‚Äôre bored or whatever this game great for that. You don‚Äôt even have to be bored to play this game, it‚Äôs fun no matter what. Overall it a very good game.ü§©üëç
Title: GREAT

Someone can trade for your card then just decide to not send anything back in return even if you sent them something. Developers could easily patch this but haven‚Äôt for some reason. Title: Review and ideas
