Content: I would consider this a ‚Äúvisit one time a day‚Äù type of game. It‚Äôs fun to build up the boards but once you‚Äôre out of rolls you might as well wait until the next day for them to build back up. The animations are a lot and they slow the game down quite a bit. Lots of pop ups and lots of micro transactions, but it‚Äôs possible to play without spending anything if you wait.
Title: Mostly good.

Content: Long story short. If you dont pay a single dime in the game you will never even reach 5th in the events, friends can constantly destroy your landmarks, constantly as in multiple times. People who pay finish up with even more dices and money because events give out ridiculous amounts and since they can get as many points as they want, because they pay for dices, then there's no point in even trying to compete with them. You'll finish up in 25-50th place like usual. That's after you waste all your daily dice plus what you CAN get for free.
Title: Typical Cash Hungry Mobile Game

Content: I would absolutely give 5 stars to this game. Me and my friend have such a blast competing against each other, and love all of the events. But, after updating the game this time I have lost so many dice and money due to bug issues causing a restart. This is every time I open the game! Please get this fixed soon. Losing my stuff is making me lose interest in the game
Title: Bug issues

Content: Scopely missed an opportunity to make a beloved Monopoly board game relevant in the busy, hectic, mobile phone world. Instead of giving the game a true objective, you zoom around the board, not even sure what number came up on the dice (out of view!) and "collect" stickers, game pieces, shields, landmarks, money, coins, green checkmarks, dog bones... each one of these digital items can be purchased, of course, to simply get to the last board faster. There's no point to this game other than making its publisher rich. Yuck.
Title: Missed Opportunity

Content: I thought this game was awesome for months just steady playing for hours and having fun. Now the game has gotten to where you can‚Äôt advance without paying for $100 packs to buy cards and dice. The tournaments and partner challenges are unrealistic without paying for rolls. I‚Äôve spent hours playing this game getting to well over 10k net worth and have come to a screeching halt recently. I‚Äôm not sure what‚Äôs going on but you need to fix it before everybody quits playing. I haven‚Äôt gotten a new card in months. Absolutely ridiculous.

Today they give us a few dice and a sticker pack. Not even a good sticker pack but a ONE STAR sticker pack! The issues yesterday directly resulted in my not finishing the event and I got 3 one star stickers as an apology. This game is getting pointless. No way am I going to spend money on this game anymore if the developers don‚Äôt care about fixing their mistakes.

Title: Fix this!

Content: Half of my friends have now left this game because they are tired of the nearly impossible task of completing albums.   You either can‚Äôt trade the hallowed gold stickers - or you can‚Äôt get or trade for the nearly extinct stickers everyone is trying to find!  I have so many duplicates of lower star stickers, and duplicates of non-tradable stickers.   Why don‚Äôt you setup a swap feature in your shop as a safe way to trade and not get scammed.  Make this game fun again, before it runs into the ground!
Title: Release the 5 STAR STICKERS!!

Content: It‚Äôs a great game have a lot of fun playing it but only get to enjoy it for like 20 mins then the app close down saying I need to check my connection and restart the app I did that many of time and it‚Äôs still say the same thing makes wait 30 mins for a 20 min play time plzzz fix
Title: Fix the bug restart app

Content: In the beginning the game was fun. I don‚Äôt understand why you can‚Äôt trade gold stickers, it‚Äôs takes an entire hour just to get 7 dice, and everyone seems to be in search of the same stickers. Y‚Äôall hardly ever give ppl new stickers. I have went an entire week with nothing but repeats. It gets old and boring. Asking that group is pointless because no one helps and we‚Äôre all looking for the same stickers. Atp I‚Äôm about to delete because it‚Äôs no longer enjoyable.
Title: I needs to be revamped

Content: This game is fun, and frustrating all the things you want in a game, but when it comes to set 13 and on of trading cards it‚Äôs about impossible and at this point so scammy. People are now selling cards on eBay taking the fun out of the game and monopolizing literally on these stickers so many are needing just to play. It‚Äôs a game and I feel so dumb even writing this review and I‚Äôm sure no one is going to even read this to make the matter better but I feel the need to speak on this for everyone.
Title: Trading stickers

Content: It‚Äôs sooo fun at the beginning. The rush of getting stickers was so much fun‚Ä¶.until I couldn‚Äôt get good stickers anymore. I got first place 3 times on three different tournaments just to get common stickers when I‚Äôve already completed those sets. So now I have x4 or x6 on 2 star stickers just to exchange them for more boring common stickers. If I‚Äôm using a majority of my dice to do x50-x100, I expect to get better stickers than someone who plays at x1-x10.
Title: Addictive then becomes meh

Content: To me the game is truly fun.  But after awhile when you run out of dice you have no way of getting more. Especially if you can‚Äôt afford it. So if the game offered an video add for more dice instead of waiting an hour for a few too.  Then the trading cards.  You never get the ones you need. Even after you‚Äôve hit the good stack of cards, or after you‚Äôve passed the level that was even similar to the album..
Title: My honest opinion

Content: I have spent a lot of money on the game and it seems like they purposely do NOT give you certain stickers to complete albums. I‚Äôve asked about seven friends of mine if they have the stickers and they don‚Äôt either! This game is so fun but it‚Äôs no longer worth my time or my money! Definitely unhappy. Not to mention they have made it difficult to email them about issues. I tried clicking multiple links like it suggested and it always took me back to articles! SO FRUSTRATING
Title: So frustrating

Content: Really enjoying it, the only thing is I hope they add a feature to stop the pop ups when you run out of dice. Show it once and it I hit the X then it doesn‚Äôt show it the rest of the day or whatever. But it‚Äôs a lot of fun it‚Äôs simple, trading stickers with friends to complete sets makes it more fun too.
Title: Really fun and simple

Content: I love the app and I had so much fun playing it for weeks. Now though, all of a sudden it started to say ‚ÄúError‚Äù and a little message saying that the app had to restart. It has been doing this to me and my friends and it will only work for a couple minutes at a time now. I‚Äôm very disappointed being that this game is very entertaining and I wish that this 3 star rating could be 5. Please fix this. Thank you.
Title: Not Working

Content: i play this game all day every day however *it needs an in-game verified trading system so that people can‚Äôt get scammed out of cards, the Facebook group is out of control and barely anyone actually gets what they need. *also, there‚Äôs no way the wheel spins and jail rolls are accurate, probability-wise. all dice rolls and wheel spins should follow probability rules and not be rigged in the game‚Äôs favor, and this is coming from someone who has spent money on it. *also there shouldn‚Äôt be any non-tradeable cards, that‚Äôs just ridiculous and frustrating  *come up with more free ways to earn dice because waiting so long for refills makes me want to quit and i‚Äôm not spending any more money. maybe trading stars for them (the safes require too many stars btw) lots of more thoughts but those are big ones
Title: fun but rigged and could use improve mta

Content: Very Very upset right now with this game!! I am trying to finish the album like every one else and there‚Äôs only a couple of days left!! I even purchased a $50 pack deal with a pink pack included and STILL never received a new sticker! I only need 6 more cards to complete the album and have yet to get a new one in days. The point of the game is to keep playing but all they give you is 80 dice a day. Seems like the game is only interested in the money vs actually making a game that is both challenging AND rewarding !!
Title: Got 5 pink packs in one day and NEVER got a new sticker!!!

Content: I absolutely love this game and have fun playing it with family and friends. But why does it have to have a constant notification. For someone who literally is obsessed with clearing notifications and not having anything on there Phone is making my brain go crazy and it makes me want to delete the app. that‚Äôs why I had to give it 4 stars.
Title: STOP THE NOTIFICATION!

Content: The game idea is a great one. Good in game designs and progression style. Although it is crammed full of micro transaction pop ups that is pushes quite aggressively. If you run out of rolls it‚Äôs will prompt you 3 to 4 times on how you can buy rolls and keep going or invite a ton of people to get a few. Then there are ‚Äúseasonal‚Äù packs and those get pushed every time you open the app. It is free to play but the further you get in the longer it will make it harder to play without paying for things.
Title: Overloaded with micro-transactions

Content: I love this game! I have learned I can ‚Äútarget‚Äù friends and shut down their properties, which is a lot of fun.  I wish there were more small games inside the game like the bakery cake thing. That was fun! More of that please.  More rolls per hour! Single digit rolls is just super lame! Now let‚Äôs talk about all this god forsaken pop ups!  Why have all the things on the left hand side of the screen AND all the pop ups?  I am an adult I can clearly see where to spend my money! The annoying part is when I‚Äôm almost out of rolls and I get an ONSLAUGHT of popups I don‚Äôt even get to see where my game piece landed. That‚Äôs very irritating! Back off of the pop ups people! Thank you.
Title: Pop ups are out of control!

Content: I‚Äôve been trying to get a resolution for weeks and the chat with us feature is a joke so‚Ä¶ my name reverted back to my real name on its own. I did not change it so I should be able to change it back. I‚Äôve only changed my name once so I should be able to do it twice more. Although I think having a limit is unnecessary anyway but I‚Äôd like to just get mine back to what it was.  Help please!
Title: Bug issue maybe???

Content: Game is fun and addicting  , but when it come to dice it‚Äôs very hard to get them and takes for ever to regenerate , events are completely unfair at times as well as stickers are always the same never anything new so completing sets is extremely difficult and frustrating over all the game is fun but also rigged if you play you‚Äôll love it but soon realize why many of us who play say it‚Äôs rigged.
Title: Fun but frustrating

Content: It seems like the more I advance to higher levels, the more the app glitches. I‚Äôve been trying to upgrade landmarks for the past 30 min then an error message pops up. The exact same thing happened last month before the system wide shutdown happened. I lost EVERYTHING and had to start back over. It keeps my mind occupied in idled moments. But the ‚Äúglitchyness‚Äù is becoming a trend.
Title: This game becoming a rip off

Content: This game has become obviously more and more pay to play. What‚Äôs see once fun events now drain every last roll you have carefully saved up, just wanting you to spend $$$$ to keep playing. Spooky car partners is the last straw for me. It takes significant effort to accumulate the event spins (now rewarding 1:1 instead of prior events at 2:1), plus now it takes MORE points to build each piece. Just plain GREEDY! You couldn‚Äôt possibly finish the event with just free play.
Title: Game has gotten greedy!

Content: Love the game. Wish it was easier to earn dice so that we could play more. Buying them is very expensive given the fact that they get used up very quickly, hence the 4 star review instead of 5 stars. Would you consider a monthly subscription option that would allow limitless play?  If so, that would be amazing. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Monthly Subscription?

Content: At first it was super fun but as I have been playing the amount of daily dice you receive has gone down a lot. Plus, I‚Äôm on level 124 and their is just no incentive to keep going. The prizes seem smaller than the low levels which makes no sense considering it requires a ton of coins to get past these levels. I am talking in the millions. Do better or I‚Äôm out. Oh and the stickers, total waste of time. I don‚Äôt even pay attention to them anymore.
Title: Fun at first, frustrating now

Content: Take a trip to the nearest railroad! Landed on a railroad! Take another trip to the nearest railroad! I have NEVER landed on a railroad so many times in all my years. The rolls are definitely fixed to have you land on a railroad about 75-80% of the time. If you like landing on those railroad properties, you will LOVE this game! I‚Äôm deleting because of how frequent I‚Äôve landed on a railroad. Yes, I‚Äôm aware I‚Äôve said ‚Äúrailroad‚Äù a whole bunch. Once you play it, you will understand why. Enjoy those RAILROADS!!!
Title: Eh. It‚Äôs ok

Content: It‚Äôs so crazy how this old board game has been modified and turned into some fun, amazing game. Where you can play with ur family and friends, you can attack their landmarks  to slow them down from trying to advance. It‚Äôs sooo much fun my family, friends and I love playing together we have an amazing time.
Title: Crazy

Content: I liked the overall concept. Fun at first and then becomes repetitive. Very annoying with the constant tiles wanting you to buy packages. Especially when you run out of dice. Totally obnoxious. I was VERY DISAPPOINTED that this game does NOT sync to iCloud or Game Center. I purchased a new iPhone, NOTHING transferred over. It started me over as brand new. No way to restore. I was near level 110. This game was good while it lasted but I‚Äôll be deleting.
Title: Started off ok. Became repetitive.

Content: Absolutely loved this game in the beginning, but now there are so many people that know how to cheat it and they are getting thousands of dice.. they win all the tournaments and are able to get the 4and 5 star cards. Meanwhile, the rest of us are trying to play with our 8 dice an hour..very frustrating, and it doesn‚Äôt help that the game glitches and takes what few dice you have. Fix it so once you delete the game you can‚Äôt get your progress back..

The only think I wish could be changed is that you can get extra of the gold cards but can‚Äôt trade them, it would be nice if we could trade them and get the extra rolls for completing albums

Dice are hard to get and random people can target you over and over and over. I understand I downloaded the game to play but I also have a job. Some people just sit around all day and beg and play. Content: This game is fun only when you have actual rolls to play with.  Unless you are willing to spend your own money to buy them, there is a lot of down time waiting for the free ones given, which isn‚Äôt enough to do much with.   In the time that you are waiting for free rolls opponents have to the opportunity to destroy your properties.  So when you do have rolls,  you are earning money just to repair them.  It would be more enjoyable if there was a way to get more rolls, more often.
Title: Boring

Content: I enjoy this game but there are a few issues that I don‚Äôt like which is why I‚Äôm not giving it 5 stars.  For  partner events we should have to option to delete the partner if they aren‚Äôt contributing. Secondly, the 4 and 5 star stickers are almost impossible to get. The rare times I do get  one, it‚Äôs a duplicate. We don‚Äôt get reward led enough dice for finishing boards.
Title: Losing interest

Content: So last night before I went to bed I had 4796 dice I woke up with 120 !? How!? What type of scam is going on here? I took a screenshot and recorded because I just had a feeling that was gone happen because honestly that‚Äôs not the first time something like that has happen to me but before I couldn‚Äôt remember exactly how many dice I had so I couldn‚Äôt press the issue . This time I took a screenshot! I spend way to much money to get dice and more money to win the event and now y‚Äôall take my dice away? Who is responsible for replacing it? Is this a scam or what?!
Title: Missing dice

Content: There was a big technical issue. Everyone loss big time. I spent $34 on an offer and I didn‚Äôt get it. I even sent the screenshot of the purchase. I was told I‚Äôll get my dice ( which I still haven‚Äôt) then I was told I have to get in touch with Apple because unfortunately they couldn‚Äôt do something and now I‚Äôm being told they couldn‚Äôt find the purchase. So now we have a ghost in the game stealing data information!!! I‚Äôm very upset and I will be canceling my account and I will never play again EVER!!! Kudos monopoly for stealing all of our hard earned coin‚Äôs
Title: Thieves

Content: This game used to be fun but now it‚Äôs just getting quite frustrating and annoying. It costs so much money to buy anything. It‚Äôs to the point where it‚Äôs costing billions to complete a board. In order to complete any of their separate missions for rewards is insane. The same stickers over and over again. Can‚Äôt gift the golden ones but you hardly ever get them but don‚Äôt worry you‚Äôll get 17 of the same pointless 1 star stickers that are totally pointless. It‚Äôs very obvious that this game was made for one thing and one thing ONLY. MONEY! smh.
Title: Rip off!

Content: Love the game but I‚Äôve been refunded stickers and still put over my daily trade limit with no explanation. Have landed to get gold cards multiple times and still can‚Äôt get the ones I need in that star level. Instead I‚Äôm getting multiple, untradeable golds which is useless. Title: Eh

Content: The reason I‚Äôm writing this do you stars is because it‚Äôs not it‚Äôs fun but it‚Äôs not that fun and like when I‚Äôm bored and I have nothing to do when I can‚Äôt pick a game I pick this one because it actually has lots of things you can, Caleb people and like you can build buildings like I finish my town in the whole entire board and that was fun to buildings. It looks like Los Angeles and stuff, so yeah you should probably download the game.
Title: The wonders of monopoly

Content: I love the concept of the game having played the board game growing up. It is fun and entertaining especially when connected to friends. I love the special events.  My issues are as follows: 8 dice per hour until you reach 80 then none. No matter how high a level you reach, you only get 50 dice for completing your board. These issues lead me to believe the developers are in this to make mega dollars because Monopoly money is abundant but more dice are sold for real money.  Counting is often off. I see many times the count is one short of the dice roll.  The reward for completing your sticker album is less than the previous album.  I hope the developers will take a look at the big picture to keep the game fun and exciting.
Title: Great game but

Content: The measly 8 dice an hour you get is pathetic. Oh you can BUY dice but they are over priced. The stickers you receive are slow to get what you need and most time duplicates. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NON EXISTENT!  I tried to contact customer service 11 days ago and no response. It is a text/chat chain. Every day I add a comment stating another day has passed with no reply from customer service. It started out to be a fun game, however the creators have gotten greedy
Title: Poor customer service & lack of being able to play

Content: pop up ‚Äúadds‚Äù (its the sales for the game, in the game)  are the only thing that get on my nerves. it makes it lag a little. if I wanna buy something im going to take the time to go find it and then buy it, not buy it off the pop up tabs they have. they get very annoying as im just trying to play the game. and 60 rolls for a new world? insane. it needs like 150.

Also, several people have quit playing because the rolls are not enough. 25 rolls don‚Äôt go anywhere üò≠ just listen to us lol help us out. We are crackheads out here.

I should see his new board but I dont. Please let me know if there something to do about that, its not fun if I cant get revenge. üòÑ

Content: I‚Äôve opened five packs striaght and got nothing but duplicates I even bought a pack yesterday the day before and and got nothing but duplicates the only ‚Äúnew‚Äù cards I‚Äôve gotten have been gifted from somebody else   I had 190 something dice rolls last night I loaded back in this morning and had barley 70   It‚Äôs a fun game just can‚Äôt stand the inconsistency
Title: Stop giving me duplicates on bought packs

Content: This evil twisted game don‚Äôt pretend other thing that you become addicted and start waisting your money in it. I understand that the idea is doing profit but this is ridiculous. The game is designed for you to lose all the time with a little hope that you are going forward. Every promotion, every ‚Äúreward‚Äù has a catch. For instance, the stupid cake factory is a scam, you struggle to get the cookies to play the roulette but you never achieve to win the prizes, with the only idea that you end up buying more stuff to keep playing as an idiot all the time.
Title: DON‚ÄôT DOWNLOAD THIS EVIL GAME

Content: This game is such a cash grab & all they want you to do is spend your money. They give you the illusion that you‚Äôre playing a fun game but it‚Äôs just a way for them to make money. You start to realize that you‚Äôre always falling super close to reaching a reward & running out of the one thing that allows you to play. BECAUSE THEY WANT YOU TO SPEND YOUR MONEY. even when they change up reward tiles, you all of a sudden stop landing on them, when you normally do! such a rigged game that i hope no one allows them to tempt them into spending any more money on!
Title: CASH GRAB!

Content: I love this game hands down, but I think there should be some add ons that make the game more interesting and fun. For the shut downs, I think it should be a lever that determines how hard you hit the landmark you‚Äôre choosing, and how much money you‚Äôll receive for that hit.   BRING MORE MINI GAMES LIKE THE CAR SHOW. MAKE GIFTING ROLLS A THING. Lol.   The golden tickets are just plain IRRITATING. I wish they could be gifted as well, but only after a certain stage. Like stage 50 or something. Also, the purple pack and blue pack of stickers should have at least a minimum of one 5 star sticker. Everytime. Just my opinion though. I play this game out of my sleep sometimes, it‚Äôs addictive üí™üèΩüî•
Title: The BEST

Content: I really enjoyed this game during the first few sets. With this new set the reward of dice for finishing is wayyyy lower than the last set! Us receiving only 8 dice per hour is ridiculous. It‚Äôs been way harder to receive gold cards. Making it clearly obvious all they want us to do is spend money to get dice so we are able to finish events and complete sets. Instead of making it a more fair, even balanced field to get everything on our own without buying every single day to keep up and finish before the end date ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Title: No dice!!

Content: I gave this game a four star because there is some cons to this game that I think they should consider. First this game is really addicting and fun to play. Collecting stickers and tokens is neat, and collecting other little stuff is fun too. It keeps the game interesting.  I don‚Äôt necessarily like the idea that we have to wait an hour just for a few dice. To me 15 mins for a few, sounds more reasonable. A whole hour just seems too much. In the game you barely get a chance to earn dice and if you do, it‚Äôs only a little bit.  With the stickers they like to give you a lot that you already have. Seeing multiples of the same one doesn‚Äôt seem fair.   Other than that this game is cool!
Title: Addicting game

Content: This review is not about the game. It‚Äôs actually about how many times this game pops up as an ad when I‚Äôm playing other games in the fact that you have to close this pop-up out 4√ó to Close out from your screen. It‚Äôs super super annoying. These guys are desperate for money that they make you close the ad out four times before it disappears
Title: Ads

Content: At first, I and my extended family all joined, and were having a good time with it. But now it seems harder to get dice, (without paying for it) of course. We‚Äôve all said the same thing that playing this game isn‚Äôt as much fun anymore. We have lots of money in the ‚Äúbank‚Äú but no dice to even play the game. There should be more opportunities to get dice. WAY more than there is currently. I‚Äôm speaking for all 7 of us. We‚Äôre quickly losing interest.  Developers, please fix this.

Content: This game used to be absolutely phenomenal. However, recent updates have shown the main focus is to be a money grab from the players. Lower dice rewards from set completions. No update on dice caps. I‚Äôm on map level 234 and it costs over $12billion to complete. That cannot be acquired when you can only max roll x5 or x10. Pretty much pointless to play this now. Not to mention there has been dice glitches that some players have that still has not been patched and they rack up about 70k points in tournaments out of nowhere.
Title: No Point in Playing Anymore

Content: The game is okay. It does pass the time but I feel as though they could do better with earning more dices‚Ä¶ There way to many opportunities to get cash during game play but few to none for dice. Why does it take an hour to receive 8 free dice, but cash is given instantly when you roll the dice. Went bankrupt over 120million won it back with an hour. Dice not so quickly.

Content: The game is fun but the developers need to change the fact that people that are NOT on your friends list can do a Bank heist! We know the game bots are doing it. But us as actual players can only do a heist on our ‚Äòfriends‚Äô. Then y‚Äôall have the nerve to wipe us out! Just a random not taking multimillions! Y‚Äôall can‚Äôt really believe that‚Äôs going to make people want to spend money.  Not cool
Title: Heads-up‚Ä¶

I love my sister loves and my mom!! 10/10 definitely recommend for all ages 7+!!
Title: Best road trip game (in my opinion)

Content: If you purchase items in game and don‚Äôt move through process fully like setting phone down If game times out you don‚Äôt get your items and support won‚Äôt refund nor give you your items it‚Äôs just a loss for you as a customer
Title: Doesn‚Äôt give you items you pay for

Content: Overall a good game, pretty addicting but one big problem, the sticker trading. There are at least 10 stickers that everyone will need and the supply won‚Äôt meet the demand. I think the greed of human nature was greatly underestimated when this concept was established. Like I said overall a good game but it can be frustrating trying to complete sticker packs when you HAVE to rely on trading
Title: Good

Content: I have only had this game for one day and it is already refusing to work. The game loads up and then forces me to watch the net worth upgrade animation and then does not me exit the upgrade screen. This is very frustrating and I‚Äôve tried logging out and logging back, and deleting and redownloading the app.
Title: Freezing screen

Content: I play this game everyday, all the time. I work two jobs and all my coworkers at both jobs play this game. The one thing that we all dislike, and will be the reason we quit playing soon, you can never get the stickers you need. Everyone is looking for the same cards. Content: It‚Äôs a great game! Much better than the board game. But it is very repetitive. I‚Äôd like to see more, different rewards. We are getting the same rewards, same games, at higher levels. I‚Äôm at level 1800 and am still getting 1 and 2 star stickers in rewards packs. The higher the level, the higher the property values, the rewards should also increase in value.
Title: More variety!

Content: I love this game it‚Äôs really fun and before I found out about this game I was getting really board of the same old games but then I found this game and I have a lot of fun but if there‚Äôs one thing I wish we could trade golds cause some people get extra golds but we can‚Äôt trade them like we might as well not get extra golds if we can trade them. But besides that this game is fun.
Title: Wish we could trade golds

Content: This game was fun in the beginning. It was easy to get or trade 1 to 3 stickers. Four and five star sticker cards are hard to get and trade. Some people scam you for the 5 sticker cards. You are forced to spend money to buy dice if you want to continue to to earn 4/5 star stickers. Seven dice an hour is a joke. You should at least be able to replenish your dice to your maximum. Even 80 dice doesn‚Äôt last long. It was fun while it lasted. I‚Äôm deleting this app and going  back to playing Candy Crush.
Title: Fun While it Lasted

Content: I think the game is amazing and fun. But to have to go into a fb group to trade cards is ridiculous and very frustrating especially when nobody interacts with you and you‚Äôre asking for help. I think an update needs to be made to let us trade with the friends we have on the app it‚Äôs and stop trying to use fb to connect us into trading cards ! It doesn‚Äôt Work !!!!!
Title: UPDATE TRADING CARDS BETWEEN FRIENDS WE ALREADY HAVE

Content: So how is it possible that people that I do not even have on my Facebook friend list, are able to do a ‚Äúbank heist‚Äù that leaves my account on 0 no matter how many million dollars I have. This is a thing that happens every day, I go to sleep and when I wake up all my money is gone. In the rules of the game it says that they only take 3% of your money and your account should never reach 0. But yet every day I have to start from 0. Is really unpleasant because is really hard to make money and to buy buildings at my level. I‚Äôm very displeased.
Title: Horrible

Content: This is an update from my last one. Title: Still buggy

Content: i LOVE this game and so far i have had no problems until today. me and multiple friends have tried to play but it keeps saying that there is an error causing the game to refresh, making us unable to even load the game. other than this one problem i have no complaints and im just hoping it can get fixed soon.

Title: App download and loading

Content: I love this game so much. I have been playing for a few months and the great thing about it is you can‚Äôt get stuck because you‚Äôre always getting more dice. It‚Äôs always so satisfying to watch the cities slowly upgrade and then to see the finished product is amazing. Would highly recommend this game.
Title: Best game ever

Content: This App bears no resemblance to the classic Monopoly save for the game board, Tokens and overall layout. Add in the nonexistent customer support and that Scopely sells your personal information to less than reputable firms and outright scammers makes Monopoly Go a definite hard pass. If you‚Äôre a fan of the original Monopoly, give Monopoly Go! The Middle Digit!!

Title: Addictive

Content: The game is fast-paced and fun at first. Then, as it gets more difficult, it gets extremely boring. That is, however, if you don't make in-app purchases. What in-app purchases? Oh...you can't miss them! They are littered all over the screen. Every 3 seconds you have a new wave of promotional ads to purchase cash/dice you have to click through. It ruins the game, entirely. Monopoly Go! is just another game you have to buy to win. Sad.
Title: Obnoxious In-App Purchases

Content: Monopoly Go has an excellent UI, with plenty of animation and coloring. It's fun to watch your token circle the board and the reactions of the little sellers. But ultimately the game's UX is terribly BORING. As your token moves on the board, your only action occurs if you land on a railroad. You never roll on your own.  You're just looking at the token moving around the board. Also NEVER buy any rolls whatsoever. You can easily accumulate rolls just by playing. I reached Level 6 without any purchases. If you want mindless entertainment, this game is for you.

Content: Anyone who can do simple math can figure out that the multipliers make no sense. This game is trying to force people to spend actual money as a ‚Äúfree‚Äù to play game. I have tested this multiple times rolling with a single multiplier and then a times 2,3,5,10,50 and 100 multiplier and it mathematically does not add up. I cannot be the only person who has figured this out otherwise there is no hope for humanity. Someone who has developed this game should reach out to me as I have hired a lawyer and plan to sue for actual money and not fake in game money. Thanks!

Content: It was cool when I first started playing but the more players they got the worse the in app purchases got. The last album set was fine but they made every set with a gold card this time, which means you can‚Äôt even trade to complete any set, you have to find the gold cards on your own. I might as well take a break from the game and not come back to it since I‚Äôm at 0, now I have nothing to lose

It just seems very heavily pointed toward buying their products to expedite your experience. You obviously don‚Äôt HAVE to buy anything. When you get notifications that someone robbed you or that someone took down you structure and the only way to get more shields is to land on them but you don‚Äôt have any rolls left? Seems like a purchase is in order  TL;DR  Game IS fun. Definitely very micro transaction oriented
Title: Pay to [almost] win: the mobile game

Content: I actually love playing the game. It‚Äôs a great game for a quick play on your down time. However to continue getting HUNDREDS of the SAME CARD is absurd. I also feel as though once we‚Äôve passed the 100 on the map we should get 100 rolls instead of the same 50. The entire country is playing this game right now & completing sticker books shouldn‚Äôt be this complicated.
Title: Raise the Rolls & give less repeated stickers

Content: There isn‚Äôt really an overarching goal or anything to play towards and when you upgrade the buildings they don‚Äôt really do anything. It felt like the same thing over and over and I only made it to the third map. Not much to do outside of rolling and upgrading. Other games like coc and sim city at least have some level of interaction outside of just upgrading and those games progression system shows significant visual changes as you progress. Don‚Äôt waste your time, felt like my brain was turning to mush while playing.

Title: Nothing like the Original Monopoly

Content: This game is attracting new users based on 2 factors. 1. On the name of "Monopoly" brand 2. People required to add "friends" in game to earn cetain number of people and sharing the invites  There is nothing fun in this game after understanding the mechanism. Just mindless autopilot game with hundreds of pop-ups to buy in game resources.   There is not even an iota of multiplayer (with your friends) gameplay. This seems to be a cash grab app relying on "Monopoly" name and nothing else. I would like to know from the developer team, what was their intention for making this game or to make it popular.   For Apple App Store:  Could you please make a feature to report such apps and show some warning on this game. Also, please check the authenticity of 5 star reviews. If they are genuine accounts and their owners are not just developers themselves or worst case bots.

Needles to say, I spent way too much money on this game.

Content: Was skeptical at first that it could live up to the Monopoly name. I was pleasantly surprised and the game grew on me more and more.  Many different variables keeps it entertaining. I spend some amount of money on any game that keeps me entertained.   But then it escalated to the point where you need to spend $50-$100/week to complete your goals. Without hitting these marks, you don‚Äôt win the cute game pieces, you can‚Äôt win the dice prize packs and you stand no chance of advancing.   I give this game 1 star because this multi-billion dollar game does not care about anything except making their millions.

You‚Äôve landed on a mini game!  Mini game 1) click on ‚Äòopponent‚Äôs‚Äô city building. You make money. Oh and your opponent is almost definitely a bot.  Mini game 2) Bank heist! Definitely not worth the space it's taking up on my phone. Fun while it lasted, but, I will be deleting this app.

You can buy rolls and keep playing but you will still be more unlucky the longer you play.   And the very worst feature of the game is the dang pop ups when you run out of rolls. Go figure it‚Äôs just like the other dice rolling games.   But great game for a couple of days!  Not worth to spend money on.

Content: Be wary of sticker trading. The game promotes and directs you through a Facebook trading group operated by the Scopely Inc. team. Continuous scams and spamming of fraudulent activity through this channel. There needs to be another way in game for trading to create and safe and friendly game experience. If trading needs to be done in order to obtain in game experiences than accountability by the team needs to be taken to insure the gaming experience. I will request a full refund in the matter now.

Content: I‚Äôve always loved the physical Original Monopoly game. But I don‚Äôt get to play it often! When I saw the add for this game, I immediately downloaded it! I‚Äôm so glad they made this game.                    Now, I can play Monopoly anytime, anywhere.             Amazing game, thanks for creating it!!!
Title: Five stars!!

Content: DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME. It‚Äôs sad that has to be said about a board game for your phone but it‚Äôs that serious. Yes it‚Äôs fun as all get out but this game is set up strictly to make you HAVE to spend money to succeed at all. And even when you spend money you still don‚Äôt get where you should. I wish I would have never heard of it. Unless you have tremendous patience & don‚Äôt care about winning at all.. don‚Äôt play. You have been warned.
Title: F this game

Content: It was a fun game - but the better you do, or the closer you get, or the $ you spend and all of a sudden no matter what multiplier you use - 1500 dice rolled and zero landings on a railroad or the corners for the current mini game. And packs have gold cards you already have and you can‚Äôt trade. And the FB trading groups are filled with scammers and NO Mods help, ban, or reply.   Last game I buy like this - apple should do better. Scopely should do better. FB should do better.
Title: Algorithm is not in your favor

Content: Stop giving so many repeat stickers... what a mission its been to get the last 6/7 I need and if I trade all the repeats that the game keeps giving, all i get is more repeats... aside from that the game is pretty fun lol. A few glitches here and there and has freezed up on me a couple times but nothing crazy
Title: Stickers...

Content: The cat builds are my favorite. Easiest way to get them built faster is to have other active players, and to also use the gains from each prize to build on the next car! It‚Äôs very fun and the prizes have been very good for me!
Title: So addicting!

Content: If you ever play coin, master it‚Äôs just like this you can destroy people stuff and steal money from people play with your friends on Facebook like coin master you can play without Wi-Fi just not with your friends really fun game. I suggest you should try it.
Title: Game is really fun

Content: Do you know what‚Äôs cool about the game? They actually give you chances to receive a lot of rose so you can continue playing and rank up. I got all different type of mini games, free claims, and even trading cards with friends to complete more prizes five stars
Title: Dope

Content: I love this game!!!! I cant stop playing it!!! But I wished it would let do more then 5 transfers and give at least a few new cards when opening the big chests! I used my 1,500 stars and didn't get anything good in return!
Title: Addicted to this game!!!

Content: I honestly love the game and it has everyone hooked right now lol but Can you guys PLEASSEEEEE add the option to where we can trade GOLD cards? And have a option were we can BUY sticker packs from the store! Please make this happen!! Thank you!
Title: Can we get an Update?!

Content: Great game but a few suggestions to make it even better!   The game needs in app trading with in app messaging.  If I offer a sticker for another sticker let me put it up for trade in the app.  Once someone accepts the trade the app/game ensures that both players get the stickers that we agree to trade for.    Also, it should not take 1500 freaking stars to open a purple chest!!!! If I‚Äôm willing to trade 3 gold 5 star stickers I should be able to get a different 5 star in return.  No guarantees it‚Äôs still a chance but a fair exchange.    That is all! ‚úåÔ∏è
Title: Upgrade requests

Content: GREAT game! The only thing that annoys me is when I go to settings to turn off or on the sounds & music it takes about 5 minutes for it to work. Also you sometimes have to click the tab about 5 times before it shows the settings.
Title: Fix?

Content: This is the most insufferable game I‚Äôve ever had to try to play, the dice are rigged to never give you the desired squares, the game gets far too expensive around world 9, and the dice you get is minimal, you absolutely have to pay to win, and that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm deleting this poor excuse for an app, really is a shame because it was fun for the first few days, but it is immediately terrible if you are trying to play for free. Which is what it‚Äôs supposed to be. Free fun.
Title: Don‚Äôt waste your time

Content: It can become a super fun and addicting game but becomes super aggravating when you‚Äôre building up your money. I‚Äôve had random people not on my friends list steal over $70m from my account in a Bank Heist. While most people ON your friends list can only steal $200k-$3m the random people will take a massive amount. I spent a lot of real money on the game and decided it just wasn‚Äôt worth playing anymore.

I‚Äôve been playing for a couple months now and it‚Äôs starting to get old. Doesn‚Äôt matter how many sticker packs you get, you never get the stickers you need to complete packs just a bunch of repeat stickers. It takes way too long for the dice to regenerate so I‚Äôm stuck with my board destroyed and no dice. You get no type of progress rewards, it would be fun if I got prizes for doing so many bank heists or knocking down landmarks. Not happy at all
Title: Game gets old quick

Content: Been stuck for weeks needing only 1 gold card I believe this game doesn‚Äôt let you complete unless you spend a lot of money on it I‚Äôm definitely deleting it if I don‚Äôt finish album
Title: Impossible to complete

Content: The new album is absolutely ridiculous. there‚Äôs a gold card in EVERY set, and the rewards for completing sets are significantly less than last album. This was a huge mistake, and is causing SO many people I know to stop playing completely. Change it back, please! We are begging you!
Title: It‚Äôs fun, but the developers messed up big time.

Content: I truly enjoy playing this game, but my only complaint is that I can‚Äôt connect to play with friends/family that don‚Äôt have Facebook. It won‚Äôt even allow the person to make an account, they are forced to play as a ‚Äúguest‚Äù.
Title: Connecting to friends/family

Content: I feel like you guys should make the next update where you can trade gold stickers, but only at a certain time or on certain days of the week or just any type of frequency‚Ä¶but kudos for allowing people to network and showcase their social and negotiation skills!!

Title: Extremely glitchy

Content: If you don‚Äôt pay any money the the game lands you on the same exact spots on the map preventing you from getting any achievements so you can win free rolls. I‚Äôve literally wrote down my numbers and what spots I hit they‚Äôre excessively repetitive on all four sides. Once you start liking the game they want you to pay to play. And oh yeah I invited several people to the game to get free rolls using my link. Some worked some didn‚Äôt. So don‚Äôt waste your time there either.
Title: Meh, Pay to Play

Content: I‚Äôve been a huge fan of monopoly board games! My family & I bought many editions of the board games and now monopoly is on mobile games, impressive! Free to play, no in-game ads and easy to play makes it even fun! So satisfied with this game overall. üòç

Title: Game

Title: It‚Äôs a good game BUT‚Ä¶.

Content: I would have to say that this is the best game that I‚Äôve played so far! I love how it just like the original game monopoly, only with a twist and a lot more fun! That‚Äôs why I gave this a 5 star rating! If it had more stars I would definitely give it more for sure!
Title: Awesomeness

Content: First of all it‚Äôs really boring.  Second attacking other people is not fun.  Third, Even less fun is when other people continuously pick on you and attack you but no on else just because. Title: Boring, mean-spirited.  Do not enjoy playing.

Content: The game itself can be pretty enjoyable, but the amount of pop-ups to purchase more dice and money is downright robbery! You will have to wait a full 10-12 HOURS to be able to roll 70 dice, and that will only last you for about 5 minutes because you‚Äôre constantly landing on constant empty spaces. I would suggest 10 dice per hour, or an option to play an add to earn extra dice if wanted. I wouldn‚Äôt mind playing an ad rather than paying money to get extra dice.
Title: OUTRAGEOUS DICE REFILL!

Content: No response since May 16, 2023 from in app customer support regarding shields error. I literal had over 100 shields an hour ago. Only 4 were used in the last hour and now I have zero (0) shields which allowed 1 of my properties to be hit. How is that even possible?   This is clearly an error. And since it takes more dice to continue playing to get more shields, you either have to allow your properties to be destroyed or pay for more dice.   I should be refunded for my last 2 purchases due to this game error/flaw.    I should just start paying someone to hack the game instead of paying for the game to not work properly.  Not like Support will ever respond to fix anything.  üôÑ

Content: This is nothing like the Monopoly game I‚Äôm used to playing. And personally, I don‚Äôt like the fact that one of the main premises of this game is to steal from everyone else or damage someone else‚Äôs property. This is definitely no kind of family game that you would want to play with your children to teach them that it‚Äôs okay to steal and destroy someone else‚Äôs property. And I miss the days when you didn‚Äôt have to pay just to keep playing a game. What an awful game.

Content: I love love love this game, however‚Ä¶. Title: Addicted to this game

Content: The actual card game Monopoly go is fun. It‚Äôs a fast version of Monopoly, retaining some of the strategy, just at a faster pace.   This is not that. This is a dumbed down, mindless perversion of Monopoly. You know all those things you like about MG? Like buying properties? Or choosing where to build houses and hotels? This game has none of that. It‚Äôs devoid of any strategy, critical thinking and the ruthlessness that made Monopoly fun.   And to top it off, they make you PAY to roll the dice (or wait an hour) to keep playing. Honestly, they would have to pay ME to keep playing this idiot version of monopoly. Content: MonopolyGO‚Äôs gameplay structure is no different than to that of slot machine games. You roll dice to earn money, you build your town, have side quests, all with no ultimate goal.   It‚Äôs nothing but dopamine hit after dopamine hit. Eventually building your town gets so expensive that you‚Äôll have to pay to roll dice.  Read that again. You will feel the need to pay for dice rolls for gameplay that will NEVER satisfy you.   Games like this are telling of how our society has shifted through mobile games and how companies are profiting from us.
